manzils.text: Savgand ʙa on faristagon, ki ʙaroi Xudo saf ʙastaand
savgand ʙa on faristagon, ki aʙrhoro meronand
savgand ʙa on faristagon, ki zikri Xudoro mexonand
ki Xudoi sumo Xudoi jaktost
Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin ast va har ci dar mijoni onhost. Va Parvardigori masrikhost
Mo osmoni dunjoro ʙa zinati sitoragon ʙijorostem
Va az har sajtoni nofarmon nigah dostem
To suxani sokinoni olami ʙoloro nasnavand va az har suj ronda savand
To dur gardand va ʙaroi onhost azoʙe doim
Ƣajri on sajton, ki nogahon cize ʙiraʙojad va nogahon su'lai suzandae dunʙolas kunad
Pas, az kofiron ʙipurs, ki ojo ofarinisi onho dusvortar ast jo on ci Mo ofaridaem. Mo onhoro az gile caspanda ofaridaem
Tu dar taaccuʙ sudi va onho masxara mekunand
Va cun ʙa onho pand doda savad, pand, namepazirand
Va cun ojae ʙuʙinand, az jakdigar mexohand, to onro ʙa masxara girand
Va megujand: «In cize ƣajri codui oskor nest
ojo vaqte ki mo murdem va xoku ustuxon sudem, moro zinda mekunand
jo padaroni moro?»
Bigu: «Bale, va sumo xoru ʙecora mesaved!»
Va onon xud xohand did, ki ʙa jak farmon hamaro zinda mekunand
Megujand: «Voj ʙar mo, in hamon ruzi cazost!»
In hamon ruzi dovari ast, ki duruƣas mepindosted
Ononro, ki zulm mekardand va hamrohonasonro va onhoero, ki ʙa coi Xudoi jakto meparastidand, cam' ovared
Hamaro ʙa rohi cahannam roh nison dihed
Va nigah doredason, ʙojad ʙozxost savand
«Caro jakdigarro jori namekuned?»
Na, imruz hama taslimsavandagonand
Va on goh ruj ʙa jakdigar kunand va ʙipursand
Gujand: «Sumo ʙuded, ki az dari nekxohi ʙar mo medaromaded»
Gujand: «Na, sumo imon najovarda ʙuded
Moro ʙar sumo hec ƣoliʙijate naʙud. Sumo xud mardumone nofarmon ʙuded
Guftai Parvardigoramon ʙar mo vocid sud. Aknun ʙojad ʙicasem
Mo sumoro gumroh kardem va xud niz gumroh ʙudem»
Dar on ruz hama dar azoʙ sarikand
Mo ʙo gunahkoron cunin mekunem
Cun ʙa onon gufta mesud, ki ƣajri Xudoi jakto xudoe nest, takaʙʙur mekardand
va meguftand: «Ojo ʙa xotiri soiri devonae xudojonamonro tark guem?»
Na, on pajomʙar haqro ovard va pajomʙaroni pesinro tasdiq kard
Sumo azoʙi dardovarro xohed casid
Dar ʙaroʙari amalhojaton cazo xohed did
Ƣajri ʙandagoni muxlisi Xudo
ki onhoro rizqe mu'ajjan ast
az mevaho, va giromi dostagonand
dar ʙihisthoi purne'mat
ʙar taxthoe, ki ruʙarui hamand
Va come az casmai xusguvor mijonason ʙa gardis darojad
safed astu nusandagonasro lazzatʙaxs
na dardi sar orad va na nusanda mast savad
Zanone faroxcasm, ki tanho ʙa savharoni xud nazar dorand, hamdami onhojand
Hamonandi tuxmi murƣhoe dur az dastras
Ru ʙa jakdigar kunand va guftugu kunand
Jake az onho gujad: «Maro hamnisine ʙud
ki meguft: «Ojo tu az onho hasti, ki tasdiq mekunand
Ojo on goh, ki murdemu xoku ustuxon sudem, cazojamon medihand?»
Gujand: «Metavoned az ʙolo ʙinigared?»
Az ʙolo ʙinigarad va uro dar mijoni otasi duzax ʙinad
Gujadas: «Ba Xudo savgand, nazdik ʙud, ki maro ʙa halokat afkani
Va agar mavhiʙati (ʙaxsisi) Parvardigoram naʙud, man niz az hozirsudagoni azoʙ meʙudam
Ojo moro marge nest
cuz on margi naxustin? Va digar azoʙamon namekunand?»
Har oina (alʙatta) in ast komjoʙii ʙuzurg
Amalkunandagon ʙojad ʙaroi cunin mukofote amal kunand
Ojo xurisro in ʙehtar jo daraxti zaqqum
Mo on daraxtro ʙaroi iʙtiloi (giriftorii) sitamkoron padid ovardaem
Daraxtest, ki az qa'ri cahannam merujad
Mevaas monandi sari sajtonho ast
duzaxijon az on mexurand va sikam pur mesozand
va ʙar sari on omextae az oʙi suzon menusand
Sipas ʙozgastason ʙa hamon cahannam ast
Onho padaroni xudro pes az xud gumroh joftand
va az pai onho sitoʙon meravand
Va pes az onho ʙestar pesinijon gumroh sudand
Va Mo ʙimdihandagone ʙa mijonason firistodem
Pas ʙingar, ki sarancomi on ʙimjoftagon ci guna ʙud
Ƣajri ʙandagoni muxlisi Xudo
Nuh Moro nido kard va Mo ci nek posuxdihandae ʙudem
U va kasonasro az anduhi ʙuzurg nacot dodem
Va farzandonasro ʙoqi guzostem
Va nomi neki uro dar naslhoi ʙa'd ʙoqi nihodem
Salom ʙar Nuh ʙod dar sarosari cahon
Mo nekukoronro cunin mukofot medihem
U az ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙud
Sipas digaronro ƣarq soxtem
Iʙrohim az pajravoni u ʙud
On goh ki ʙo dile xoli az suʙha ruj ʙa Parvardigoras ovard
Ba padaras va qavmas guft: «Ci meparasted
Ojo ʙa coi Xudoi jakto xudojoni duruƣinro mexohed
Ba Parvardigori cahonijon ci gumon dored?»
Nigohe ʙa sitoragon kard
va guft: «Man ʙemoram!»
Az u rujgardon sudand va ʙozgastand
Pinhoni nazdi xudojonason omad va guft: «Cize namexured
Caro suxan namegued?»
Va dar nihon daste ʙaquvvat ʙar onho zad
Qavmas sitoʙon nazdas omadand
Guft: «Ojo cizhoero, ki xud metarosed, meparasted
Xudoi jaktost, ki sumo va har ci mesozed, ofaridaast»
Guftand: «Barojas ʙinoe oozed va dar otasas andozed»
Xostand to ʙadandesi kunand, Mo niz onhoro zerdast (xoru maƣluʙ) gardonidem
Guft: «Man ʙa sui Parvardigoram meravam. U maro rohnamoi xohad kard
Ej Parvardigori man, maro farzande soleh ato kun!»
Pas uro ʙa pisare ʙurdʙor xusxaʙar dodem

Cun ʙo padar ʙa coe rasid, ki ʙojad ʙa kor sar kunand, guft: «Ej pisarakam, dar xoʙ didaam, ki turo zaʙh mekunam. Bingar, ki ci meandesi». Guft: «Ej padar, ʙa har ci farmon sudai, amal kun, ki agar Xudo ʙixohad, maro az soʙiron (saʙrkunandagon) xohi joft»
Cun har du taslim sudand va uro ʙa pesoni xoʙonid
Mo nidojas dodem: «Ej Iʙrohim
xoʙatro ʙa haqiqat paivasti», Va Mo nekukoronro cunin mukofot medihem
In ozmoise oskor ʙud
Va uro ʙa zaʙhe ʙuzurg ʙozxaridem
Va nomi neki uro dar naslhoi ʙa'd ʙoqi guzostem
Salom ʙar Iʙrohim
Mo nekukoronro incunin mukofot medihem
U az ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙud
Uro ʙa Ishok — pajomʙare soista muƶda dodem
U na Ishoqro ʙarakat dodem. Va az farzandonason ʙa'ze nekukor hastand va ʙa'ze ʙa oskoro ʙar xud sitamkor
Mo ʙa Muso va Horun ne'mat dodem
On du va mardumasonro az rance ʙuzurg nacot ʙaxsidem
Ononro jori dodem, to ƣoliʙ sudand
Va kitoʙe ravsangarason dodem
Va ʙa rohi rost hidojatason kardem
Va nomi nekasonro dar naslhoi ʙa'd ʙoqi guzostem
Salom ʙar Muso va Horun
Mo nekukoronro incunin mukofot medihem
On du az ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙudand
Va Iljos az pajomʙaron ʙud
Ba mardumi xud guft: «Ojo az Xudo nametarsed
Ojo Ba'lro ʙa xudoi mexoned va On ʙehtarini ofarinandagonro tark mekuned
Parvardngori sumo va Parvardigori padaronaton Xudoi jaktost»
Pas duruƣas ʙarovardand va onon az hozirkardagonand, (dar azoʙ)
Ƣajri ʙandagoni muxlisi Xudo
Va nomi neki uro dar naslhoi ʙa'd ʙoqi guzostem
Salom ʙar xonadoni Iljos
Mo nekukoronro incunin podos (mukofot) medihem
U az ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙud
Va Lut az pajomʙaron ʙud
U va hamai kasonasro nacot dodem
Ƣajri pirazane, ki ʙo mardumi sahr ʙimond
Sipas digaronro halok kardem
Sumo ʙar (maskani) onho meguzared ʙomdodon
va somgohon. Ojo aql namekuned
Va Junus az pajomʙaron ʙud
Cun ʙa on kistii pur az mardum gurext
qur'a zadand va u dar qur'a maƣluʙ sud
Mohi furu ʙurdas va u loiqi sarzanis ʙud
Pas agar az tasʙeh gujon nameʙud
to ruzi qijomat dar sikami mohi memond
Pas uro, ki ʙemor ʙud, ʙa xuski afkandem
Va ʙar ʙoloi saras ʙutai kadue rujonidem
Va uro ʙa pajƣamʙari ʙar sad hazor kas va ʙestar firistodem
Onho imon ovardand va to zinda ʙudand, ʙarxurdorijason dodem
Az onho ʙipurs; «Ojo duxtaron az oni Parvardigori tu ʙosand va pisaron az oni onho?»
Ojo vaqte ki Mo maloikaro zan meofaridem, onho medidand
Ogoh ʙos, ki az duruƣguijason ast, ki megujand
«Xudo sohiʙi farzand ast». Duruƣ megujand
Ojo Xudo duxtaronro ʙar pisaron ʙartari dod
Sumoro ci mesavad? Ci guna hukm mekuned
Ojo nameandesed
Jo ʙar da'voi xud daleli ravsane dored
Agar rost megued, kitoʙatonro ʙijovared
Va mijoni Xudovu cinnijon xesovandi qoil sudand va cinnijon medonand, ki hozirkardasudagonand. (dar azoʙ)
Az on sifat, ki meovardand, Xudo pok ast
ƣajri ʙandagoni muxlisi Xudo
Sumo va ʙutone, ki meparasted
natavonisted gumroh kuned
magar on kasro, ki rohii cahannam ʙosad
«Va har kas az mo coe mu'ajjan dorad
Alʙatta mo safzadagonem
Va alʙatta mo tasʙehgujandagonem»
Agarci meguftand
«Agar az pesinijon nazdi mo kitoʙe monda ʙud
mo az ʙandagoni muxlisi Xudo meʙudem»
Onho ʙa on kitoʙ kofir sudand va ʙa zudi, ki xohand fahmid
Mo dar ʙorai ʙandagonamon, ki ʙa pajƣamʙari mefiristem, az pes tasmim giriftaem
ki alʙatta onon jori mesavand
Va laskari Mo xud ƣoliʙand
Pas to muddate az onho ruj ʙigardon
Oqiʙatasonro ʙuʙin, onho niz xohand did
Ojo azoʙi Moro ʙa sitoʙ metalaʙand
Cun azoʙ ʙa majdonason farojad, in ʙimdodasudagon ci ʙomdodi ʙade xohand dost
Az onho to cande ruj ʙigardon
Pas oqiʙatasonro ʙuʙin, onho niz xohand did
Munazzah (pokast) ast Parvardigori tu — on Parvardigori piruzmand — az har ci ʙa vasfi U megujand
Va salom ʙar pajomʙaron
Va hamd az oni Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Sod. Savgand ʙa Qur'oni sarifi sohiʙi pand
ki kofiron hamcunon dar sarkasivu ziddijat
Ci ʙisjor mardumero, ki pes az onho ʙa halokat rasonidem. Onon farjod meʙarovardand, vale gurezgohe naʙud
Dar taaccuʙ sudand az in ki ʙimdihandae az mijoni xudason ʙarxost. Va kofiron guftand: «In codugare duruƣgust
Ojo hamai xudojonro jak xudo gardonida ast? Va in cize aciʙ ast!»
Buzurgonason ʙa roh aftodandu guftand: «Biraved va ʙar parastisi xudojoni xud pojdori kuned, ki in ast cize, ki az sumo xosta suda
Mo dar in oxirin din cunin suxane nasunidaem va in ƣajri duruƣ hec nest
Ojo az mijoki hamai mo vahj ʙar u nozil sudaast?» Balki onho az vahji Man dar suʙhaand va hanuz azoʙi Maro nacasidaand
jo on ki xazinahoi rahmati Parvardigori ƣoliʙi ʙaxsandaat dar nazdi onhost
Jo farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin va har ci mijoni on dust, az oni onhost? Pas ʙo nardʙonhoe xudro ʙa osmon kasand
On co laskarest nociz az cand guruhi sikastxurdai (ʙar ziddi pajramʙaron) cam'suda
Pes az onho qavmi Nuh va Od va Fir'avn, ki mardumro ʙa cahormex mekasid, pajomʙaronro duruƣ meʙarovardand
Va niz qavmi Samud va qavmi Lut va mardumi Ajka az on camo'atho ʙudand
Az inho kase naʙud, ki pajomʙaronro duruƣ naʙarovard va uquʙati Man vociʙ omad
Inho niz ʙonge saxtro intizori dorand, cunon ki onro digar tavaqqufe (ʙozistodane) naʙosad
Va guftand: «Ej Parvardigori mo, nomai a'moli moro pes az faro rasidani ruzi hisoʙ ʙa dasti mo ʙideh!»
Bar harci megujand, saʙr kun. Va az ʙandai Mo Dovudi qudratmand, ki hamesa ʙa dargohi Mo tavʙa mekard, jod ovar
Mo kuhhoro rom kardem va kuhho har somgohu ʙomdodon ʙo u tasʙeh mekardand
Va parrandagon ʙar u cam' meomadand. Hama farmonʙari u ʙudand
Farmonravoijasro ustuvori ʙaxsidem va uro hikmatu fasohat dar suxan ato kardem
Ojo xaʙari on xusumatkunandagonro sunidai, on goh ki az devori qasr ʙa mascid daromadand

Bar Dovud doxil sudand. Dovud az onho tarsid. Guftand: «Matars, mo du da'vogar hastem, ki jake ʙar digare sitam kardaast. Mijoni mo ʙa haq dovari kun va poj az adolat ʙerun maneh va moro ʙa roxi rost hidojat kun
In ʙarodari man ast. Uro navadu nuh mes (gusfand) ast va maro jak mes. Megujad: «Onro ham ʙa man ʙideh» va dar da'vo ʙar man ƣalaʙa joftaast»

Dovud guft: «U, ki mesi turo az tu mexohad to ʙa meshoi xud ʙijafzojad, ʙa tu sitam mekunad. Va ʙisjore az sarikon ƣajri kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand — va inho niz andak hastand — ʙar jakdigar sitam mekunand». Va Dovud donist, ki uro ozmudem. Pas az Parvardigoras ʙaxsois xost va ʙa ruqu' daraftodu tavʙa kard. (Sacda)
Mo in xatojasro ʙaxsidem. Uro ʙa dargohi Mo taqarruʙ (nazdiki) ast va ʙozgaste neku

Ej Dovud, Mo turo xalifai rui zamin gardonidem. Dar mijoni mardum ʙa haq dovari kun va az pai havoi nafs marav, ki turo az rohi Xudo ʙeroh sozad. Onon, ki az rohi Xudo kacrav savand, ʙa on saʙaʙ, ki ruzi hisoʙro az jod ʙurdaand, ʙa azoʙe saxt giriftor mesavand
Mo in osmonu zamin va on ciro, ki mijoni onhost, ʙa ʙotil najofaridaem. In gumoni kasonest, ki kofir sudand. Pas voj ʙar kofiron az otas
Ojo kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, monandi fasokunandagon dar zamin qaror xohem dod? Jo parhezgoronro cun gunohkoron
Kitoʙe muʙorak ast, ki onro ʙar tu nozil kardaem, to dar ojathojas ʙijandesand va xiradmandon az on pand girand
Sulajmonro ʙa Dovud ato kardem. Ci ʙandae nekue ʙud va ruj ʙa Xudo dost
On goh ki ʙa hangomi asr asponi tezravro, ki istoda ʙudand, ʙa u nison dodand
guft: «Man dustii in asponro ʙar jodi Parvardigoram ʙigzidam, to oftoʙ dar pardai ƣuruʙ pusida sud (ja'ne namozi asr qazo sud)
on asponro nazdi man ʙozgardoned». Pas ʙa ʙuridani soqho va gardanason oƣoz kard
Mo Sulajmonro ozmudem va ʙar taxti u casadero afkandem va u ruj ʙa Xudo ovard
Guft: «Ej Parvardigori man, maro ʙiʙaxs va maro mulke ato kun, ki pas az man kase sazovori on naʙosad, ki tu ʙaxsojandai»
Pas ʙodro romi u kardem, ki ʙa narmi har co, ki mexost, ʙa farmoni u meraft
Va devonro, ki ham ʙinokor ʙudandu ham ƣavvos (sinovar)
Va guruhe digarro, ki hama ʙasta dar zanciri u ʙudand
In atoi ʙehisoʙi Most, xohi onro ʙideh va xohi nigah dor
Urost nazdi Mo taqarruʙu (nazdik sudanu) ʙozgaste neku
Va az ʙandai Mo Ajjuʙ jod kun, on goh ki Parvardigorasro nido kard, ki maro sajton ʙa rancu azoʙ afkanda ast
«Pojatro ʙar zamin ʙikuʙ: in oʙest ʙaroi sustusuj va sard ʙaroi osomidan»
Va ʙa u xonavodaas va hamcandi on az digar joronro ato kardem va in xud rahmate az Mo ʙud va ʙaroi xiradmandon andarze (pande)
«Dastae az cuʙhoi ʙorik ʙa dast gir va ʙo on (zanatro) ʙizan va savgandi xudro masikan». Uro ʙandae soʙir joftem, U, ki hamesa ruj ʙa dargohi Mo dost, ci neku ʙandae ʙud
Bandagoni Mo Iʙrohimu Ishoq va Ja'quʙ on mardoni qudratmandu ʙo ilmro jod kun
Ononro xislati pokdili ʙaxsidem, to jodi qijomat kunand
Onho dar nazdi Mo intixoʙsudagonu nekonand
Va Ismoil va Aljasa' va Zulkiflro jod kun, ki hama az nekonand
In Qur'on pandest va parhezgoronro ʙozgaste nekust
ʙixisthoi covidon, ki dari on ʙa rujason kusoda ast
Dar on co takja zadaand va har guna mevavu nusidani, ki ʙixohand, metalaʙand
Zanone hamsol az on guna, ki ƣajri sui xud ʙa kase nazar nadorand, nazdi onhojand
In ast on cizhoe, ki ʙaroi ruzi hisoʙ ʙa sumo va'da dodaand
In rizqi Most, ki pojon najoftanist
cunin ast. Va sarkasonro ʙadtarin ʙozgastxost
Ba cahannam meravand, ki ʙad cojgohest
Bojad oʙi cusonu cirk va xunoʙai duzaxijonro ʙinusand
Va azoʙhoi digar az har nav'
In guruh ʙo sumo (ej gumrohkunandaho) ʙa otas medarojand. Xusomadason maʙod, ki ʙa otas meaftand
Gujand: «Na, xusomad sumoro naʙod. Sumo in azoʙro pesopes ʙaroi mo firistoda ʙuded, ci ʙad cojgohest!»
Gujand: «Ej Parvardigori mo, har kas, ki in azoʙro pesopes ʙaroi mo omoda kardaast, azoʙasro dar otas ducandon zijoda kun!»
Va gujand: «Caro mardonero, ki az asror (ʙadkoron). mesumurdem, aknun nameʙinem
Ononro ʙa masxara megiriftem. Ojo az nazarho dur mondaand?»
In ʙahsu cidoli ahli cahannam ʙo jakdigar cizest, ki ʙa haqiqat voqe' savad
Bigu: «Faqat hamin ast, ki man ʙimdihandae hastam va hec xudoe ƣajri Xudoi jaktoi kahhor nest
On piruzmandu ʙaxsojanda, Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va har ci mijoni onhost»
Bigu: «In xaʙare ʙuzurg ast
ki sumo az on ruj megardoned
Hangome ki ʙo jakdigar cidol (ʙahs) mekardand, man xaʙare az sokinoni olami ʙolo nadostam
Tanho az on ruj ʙa man vahj mesavad, ki ʙimdihandae ravsangar hastam»
Parvardigorat ʙa faristagon guft: «Man ʙasarero az gil meofarinam
Cun tamomas kardam va dar on az ruhi xud damidam, hama sacdaas kuned!»
Hama faristagon sacda kardand
Ƣajri Iʙlis, ki sarkasi kardu az kofiron sud
Guft: «Ej Iʙlis, ci ciz turo az sacda kardan dar ʙaroʙari on ci Man ʙo du dasti xud ofaridaam, man' kard? Ojo ʙuzurgi namudi jo maqome arcmand dosti?»
Guft: «Man az u ʙehtaram. Maro az otas ofaridai va uro az gil»
Guft: «Az in co ʙerun sav, ki tu rondasudai
Va to ruzi qijomat la'nati Man ʙar tust»
Guft: «Ej Parvardigori man, maro to ruze, ki az nav zinda savand, muhlat deh»
Guft: «Tu az muhlatjoftagoni
to on ruzi mu'ajjani ma'lum»
Guft: «Ba izzati Tu savgand, ki hamagonro gumroh kunam
ƣajri onho, ki az ʙandagoni muxlisi Tu ʙosand»
Guft: «Haq ast va on ci megujam, rost ast
ki cahannamro az tuvu az hamai pajravonat pur kunam»
Bigu: «Man az sumo muzde nametalaʙam va nestam az onon, ki ʙa duruƣ cize ʙar xud meʙofand»
Va ii ƣajri pande ʙaroi mardumi cahon nest
Va tu ʙa'd az in az xaʙari on ogox xohi sud
Nozil sudani in kitoʙ az coniʙi Xudoi piruzmandi hakim ast
Mo in kitoʙro ʙa rosti ʙar tu nozil kardem (firistodem). Pas Xudoro ʙiparast va dini xud ʙaroi U xolis gardon

Ogoh ʙos, ki dini xolis az oni Xudost va onon, ki ƣajri U digarero ʙa xudoi giriftand, guftand: «Inonro az on ru meparastem, to vasilai nazdikii mo ʙa Xudoi jakto savand. Va Xudo dar on ci ixtilof mekunand, mijonason hukm xohad kard. Xudo onro, ki duruƣguvu nosipos ʙosad, hidojat namekunad
Agar Xudo mexost, ki ʙaroi xud farzande ʙargirad, az mijoni maxluqoti xud har ciro, ki mexost, intixoʙ mekard. Pok ast. Ust Xudoi jaktoi qahhor
Osmonhovu zaminro ʙa haq ʙijofarid. Saʙro ʙar ruz doxil mekunad va ruzro ʙar saʙ. Va oftoʙu mohro rom gardonid va har jak to zamone mu'ajjan dar harakatand. Ogoh ʙos, ki Ust piruzmandu omurzanda

Sumoro az jak tan ʙijofarid. Va az on jak tan zanasro ofarid. Va ʙarojaton az corpojon hast cuft ʙijofarid. Sumoro dar sikami modaraton dar cand marhala dar daruni torikihoi segona ofarinis ʙaxsid. In ast Xudoi jakto, Parvardigori sumo. Farmonravoi az oni Ust. Xudoe cuz U nest. Pas ci guna rujgardonaton mesozand

Agar nosiposi kuned, Xudo az sumo ʙehocat ast va nosiposiro (nosukriro) ʙaroi ʙandagonas namepisandad. Mepisandad, ki siposguzor ʙosed. Va hec kas ʙori gunohi digarero ʙar dus namekasad. Bozgasti hamai sumo nazdi Parvardigoraton ast. U sumoro az korhoe, ki mekardaed, ogoh mekunad, U ʙa on ci dar dilho meguzarad, ogoh ast

Cun ʙa odami dardu rance ʙirasad, ʙa Parvardigoras ruj meovarad va Uro mexonad. On goh cun ʙa u ne'mate ʙaxsad, hamai on du'ohoro, ki pes az in karda ʙud, az jod meʙarad va ʙaroi Xudo hamtojone qaror medihad, to mardumro az tariqi U gumroh kunand. Bigu: «Andake az kufrat ʙahramand sav, ki tu az duzaxijon xohi ʙud!»

Ojo on kas, ki dar hamai so'ati saʙ ʙa iʙodat pardoxta jo dar sucud ast jo dar qijom va az oxirat ʙimnok ast va ʙa rahmati Parvardigoras umedvor ast, ʙo on ki cunin nest, jakson ast? Bigu: «Ojo onhoe, ki medonand ʙo onhoe, ki namedonand, ʙaroʙarand?» Tanho xiradmandon pand megirand

Bigu: «Ej ʙandagoni Man, ki imon ovardaed, az Parvardigoraton ʙitarsed. Baroi onon, ki dar hajoti incahoni neki kardaand, podosi (cazoi) nek ast. Va zamini Xudo pahnovar ast. Muzdi soʙiron ʙehisoʙu komil ado mesavad!»
Bigu: «Man amr sudaam, ki Xudoro ʙiparastam va ʙaroi U dar din ixlos kunam
Va maro farmudaand, ki naxustini musalmonon ʙosam»
Bigu: «Agar Parvardigoramro nofarmoni kunam, az azoʙi on ruzi ʙuzurg metarsam»
Bigu: «Xudoro meparastam va ʙaroi U dar dini xud ixlos mevarzam
Biparasted har cizi digarero cuz U». Bigu: «Zijonkunandagon kasone hastand, ki dar ruzi qijomat xud va xonadonasonro az dast ʙidihand. Baxus ʙosed, ki in zijone oskor ast
Boloi sarason taʙaqoti otas ast va dar zeri pojason taʙaqoti otas». In cizest, ki Xudo ʙandagoni xudro ʙo on metarsonad. Pas, ej ʙandagoni Man, az Man ʙitarsed
Va kasonero, ki az parastisi ʙuton parhez kardaand va ʙa Xudo ruj ovardaan. d, ʙasorat (xaʙari xus) ast. Pas ʙandagoni Maro ʙasorat deh
on kasone, ki ʙa suxan gus medihand va az ʙehtarini on pajravi mekunand, onhojand kasone, ki Xudo hidojatason karda va onho xiradmandonand
Ojo kasero, ki hukmi azoʙ ʙar u ʙarovarda suda, tu metavoni uro, ki dar otas ast, ʙirahoni
Ammo ʙaroi onon, ki az Xudo metarsand, ƣurfahoest (imorathoest) ʙar ʙoloi ham soxta, ki az zerason cujʙoron ravon ast. In va'dai Xudost va Xudo va'dai xud xilof naxohad kard

Ojo nadidai, ki Xudo az osmon ʙoron firistod va onro cun casmasorhoe dar zamin ravon gardonid, on goh ʙa on kistahoi rangorang ʙirujonid, sipas hama xusk mesavand va meʙini, ki zard sudaand, on goh xurdason mesozad? Alʙatta xiradmandonro dar on pandest

Ojo kase, ki Xudo dilasro ʙar rui islom kusod va u dar partavi nuri Parvardigoras coj dorad, hamonandi kasest, ki imon nadorad? Pas voj ʙar saxtdilone, ki jodi Xudo dar dilhojason roh nadorad, ki dar gumrohii oskor hastand

Xudo ʙehtarin suxanro nozil kardaast. Kitoʙe mutasoʙeh va duto-duto, ki az tilovati on kasonero, ki az Parvardigorason metarsand, az tars tan ʙilarzad. Sipas tanu conason ʙa jodi Xudo ʙijoromad. In rohi Xudost, ki har kiro ʙixohad, ʙa on rohnamoi mekunad va har kiro Xudo gumroh kunad, uro hec rohnamoe naxohad ʙud

Ojo on kas, ki dar ruzi qijomat ʙo cehrai xud azoʙi saxti qijomatro az xud ʙozmedorad, monandi kasest ki ʙihistist? Ba sitamkoron gufta mesavad: «Ba kajfari (cazoi) korhoe, ki mekardaed, azoʙro ʙicassed!»
Pesinijonason duruƣ ʙarovardand va azoʙ az coe, ki namedonistand, ʙar sarason rasid
Xudo dar in cahon rasvojason soxt, vale agar ʙidonand, azoʙi oxirat ʙuzurgtar ast
Mo dar ni Qur'on ʙaroi mardum har guna misole ovardem, sojad pand girand
Qur'one ʙa zaʙoni araʙi ʙe hec (nuqsonu) kaci. Sojad parhezgori kunand

Xudo masale mezanad: «Mardero, ki cand tan dar u sarikand va ʙar sari u ixtilof dorand. Va marde, ki tanho az oni jake ʙosad. Ojo in du ʙo ham ʙaroʙarand? Sukru sipos Xudoro. Na, ʙestarason namedonand
Tu memiri va onho niz memirand
Sipas hama dar ruzi qijomat nazdi Parvardigoraton ʙo jakdigar husumat xohed kard
Pas kist sitamkortar az on, ki ʙar Xudo duruƣ meʙandad va suxani rostero, ki ʙar u omadaast, duruƣ meʙarorad. Ojo kofironro dar cahannam cojgohe nest
Va kase, ki suxani rost ovard va tasdiqas kard, onon parhezgoronand
Barojason har ci ʙixohand, dar nazdi Parvardigorason muhajjost. In ast podosi (mukofoti) nekukoron
to Xudo ʙadtarin amalhoero, ki kardaand, az onon noʙud kunad va ʙa ʙehtar az on ci mekardaand, mukofotason dihad
Turo ʙa kasone, ki ƣajri Xudo hastand, metarsonand. Ojo Xudo ʙaroi nigahdorii ʙandaas kofi nest? Va har kasro, ki Xudo gumroh sozad, hec rohnamoe naxohad ʙud
Har kasro, ki Xudo rohnamoi kunad, gumrohkunandae nest. Ojo Xudo ƣoliʙu intiqomgiranda nest

Agar az onho ʙipursi: «Cj kase osmonhovu zaminro ofaridaast?» Xohand guft: «Xudoi jakto». Bigu: «Pas inhoero, ki ƣajri U meparasted, ci guna meʙined? Agar Xudoi jakto ʙixohad ʙa man rance ʙirasonad, ojo inho metavonand on rancro daf' kunand? Jo agar ʙixohad ʙa man rahmate ato kunad, metavonand on rahmatro az man ʙozdorand?» Bigu; «Xudo ʙaroi man ʙas ast. Tavakkalkunandagon ʙa U tavakkal mekunand»
Bigu: «Ej qavmi man, muvofiqi imkoni xud amal kuned. Man niz amal mekunam. Va ʙa zudi xohed donist, ki
ci kase ʙa azoʙe, ki uro xor mesozad, giriftor mesavad jo azoʙi covid ʙar sari u furud meojad»
Mo in kitoʙro ʙa haq ʙaroi hidojati mardum ʙar tu nozil kardem. Pas har kas, ki hidojat joft, ʙa naf'i xudi ust va har ki gumroh sud, ʙa zijoni xud ʙa gumrohi aftoda va tu vakili onho nesti

Xudo conhoro ʙa hangomi murdanason megirad va niz coni kasonero, ki dar xoʙi xud namurdaand. Conhoero, ki hukmi marg ʙar onho ronda suda, nigah medorad va digaronro to zamone, ki mu'ajjan ast, ʙozmefiristad. Dar in iʙrathost ʙaroi onhoe, ki meandesand
Ojo ƣajri Xudo safe'one ixtijor kardand? Bigu: «Xatto agar on safe'on qudrat ʙa kore nadosta ʙosand va cizero darnajoʙand?»
Bigu: «Safo'at sarosar az oni Xudost. Az oni Ust farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin. Sipas hama ʙa nazdi U ʙozgardonda mesaved»
Cun Xudoro ʙa jaktoi jod kunand, dilhoi on kason, ki ʙa qijomat imon najovardaand, nafrat girad va cun nomi digare ƣajri U ʙurda savad, sodmon savand
Bigu: «Bor Xudoe, Tui ofarinandai osmonhovu zamin, donoi nihonu oskor, Tu mijoni ʙandagonat dar har ci dar on ixtilof (ziddijat) mekardaand, dovari xohi kard»

Agar har ci dar rui zamin ast va hamonandi on az oni sitamkoron meʙud, dar ruzi qijomat xudro ʙo on az azoʙi dardnok ʙozmexaridand. Va az Xudo ʙarojason cizhoe oskor mesud, ki hargiz hisoʙasro namekardand
Cazoi ʙadi amalhoe, ki mekardand, ʙarojason oskor sud va on ci masxaraas mekardand, girdorirdasonro ʙigirift
Cun odamiro rance rasad, Moro mexonad va cun az coniʙi xud ne'mate arzonijas dorem, gujad: «Ba saʙaʙi donoijam in ne'matro ʙa man dodaand». In ozmoise ʙosad, vale ʙestarinason namedonand
In suxane ʙud, ki pesinijonason ham meguftand, vale har ci cam' ovarda ʙudand, ʙa holason naf' nakard
Uquʙati amalhojason domangirason sud. Va az in mijon ʙa onho, ki rohi kufr pes giriftaand, uquʙati amalhojason xohad rasid va nametavonand az Mo ʙigurezand
Ojo hanuz nadonistaand, ki Xudost, ki ruzii har kasro, ki ʙixohad afzun mesozad jo tangruzias mekunad? Va dar in xud iʙrathost ʙaroi mardume ki imon meovarand
Bigu: «Ej ʙandagoni Man, ki ʙar zijoni xud isrof kardaed, az rahmati Xudo noumed nasaved. Zero Xudo hamai gunohonro meʙaxsojad. Ust ʙaxsojandavu mehruʙon
Pes az on ki azoʙ faro rasad va kase ʙa joriaton ʙarnaxezad, ʙa Parvardigoraton ruj ored va ʙa U taslim saved
Va pes az on ki ʙanogoh va ʙexaʙar azoʙ ʙar sumo furud ojad, ʙa ʙehtarin cize, ki az coniʙi Parvardigoraton nozil sudaast, pajravi kuned
to kase nagujad: «Ej hasrato ʙar man, ki dar kori Xudo kutohi kardam va az masxarakunandagon ʙudam»
Jo ʙigujad: «Agar Xudo maro hidojat mekard, man az parhezgoron meʙudam»
Jo cun azoʙro ʙuʙinad, ʙigujad: «Agar ʙori digar ʙa dunjo ʙozmegardidam, az nekukoron mesudam!»
Ore, ojoti man ʙaroi tu nozil sud va tu gardankasi kardi va az kofiron ʙudi
Dar ruzi qijomat kasonero, ki ʙa Xudo duruƣ ʙastaand, meʙini, rujason sijoh sudaast. Ojo mutakaʙʙironro dar cahannam cojgohe nest
Xudo parhezgoronro ʙa saʙaʙi rohi nacotjoʙi, ki dar pes girifta ʙudand, merahonad. Ba onho hec ʙadi narasad va az anduh dur ʙosand
Xudost, ki ofaridgori har cizest va U nigahʙoni har cize
Kalidhoi osmonhovu zamin nazdi Ust va onho, ki ʙa ojoti Xudo kofir sudaand, zijondidagon hastand
Bigu: «Ej nodonon, ojo maro farmon medihed, ki ƣajr az Xudoro ʙiparastam?»
Ba tu va pajomʙaroni pes az tu vahj sudaast, ki agar sirk ʙijovared, amalhojaton nociz gardad va xud az zijonkunandagon xohed ʙud
Balki Xudoro ʙiparast va sukrguzori U ʙos
Xudoro nasinoxtand, oncunon ki loiqi sinoxti Ust. Va dar ruzi qijomat zamin jakco dar qaʙzai Ust va osmonho dar ham pecida dar jadi qudrati U. Pok ast va ʙartar az har ci sariki U mepindorand
Va dar sur damida savad. Pas har ki dar osmonho va har ki dar zamin ast, — ƣajri onho, ki U ʙixohad, — ʙehus mesavand. Va ʙori digar dar on damida savad, nogahon az coj ʙarmexezand va menigarand
Va zamin ʙa nuri Parvardigoras ravsan savad va nomahoi a'molro ʙinihand va pajomʙaronu guvohonro ʙijovarand va dar mijoni mardum ʙa haq dovari savad va ʙar kase sitame naravad
Cazoi har kas ʙaroʙari kirdoras ʙa tamomi ado savad, dar hole ki Xudo ʙa korhoe, ki mekardaand, ogohtar ast

Va kofironro guruh-guruh ʙa cahannam ʙironand. Cun ʙa cahannam rasand, darhojas kusoda savad va nigahʙononi otas gujand: «Ojo pajomʙarone az xudi sumo ʙar sumo firistoda nasudaand, to ojoti Parvardigoratonro ʙarojaton ʙixonand va sumoro az didor ʙo cunin ruze ʙitarsonand?» Megujand: «Bale». Vale ʙar kofiron azoʙ hatmi suda ʙud
Gufta savad: «Az darhoi cahannam doxil saved, hamesa dar on co xohed ʙud». Cojgohi sarkason ci ʙad cojgohest

Va ononro, ki az Parvardigorason tarsidaand, guruh-guruh ʙa ʙihist meʙarand. Cun ʙa ʙihist ʙirasand, darhojas kusoda savad. Va darʙonhoi ʙixist gujandason: «Salom ʙar sumo, ʙihistaton xus ʙod, ʙa darun ʙijoed, hamesa dar in co xohed ʙud!»
Megujand: «Sukr Xudoero, ki har va'da, ki ʙa mo dod, rost ʙud. On zaminro ʙa meros ʙa mo dod. Va aknun dar har coi ʙihist, ki ʙixohem, makon megirem». Amalkunandagonro ci muzdi nekuest

Va faristagonro meʙini, ki girdi arsi Xudo halqa zadaand va ʙa sitoisi Parvardigorason tasʙeh megujand. Mijoni onho niz ʙa haq dovari gardad va gufta savad, ki sitois az oni Xudoest, ki Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Ho, mim
Nozil sudani in kitoʙ az coniʙi Xudoi ƣoliʙi donost
ʙaxsojandai gunoh, pazirandai tavʙa, saxtuquʙat, sohiʙi ni'am (ne'matho). Hec xudoe ƣajri U nest. Bozgasti hama ʙa sui Ust
Faqat kofiron dar ojoti Xudo cidol mekunand. Pas omadu raftason dar sahrho turo nafireʙad

Pes az onho qavmi Nuh va guruhhoe, ki ʙa'd az eson ʙudand, pajomʙarasonro takziʙ kardand. Va har ummate ohangi on kard, ki pajomʙarasro dastgir kunad va ʙa ʙotil ʙa xusumat ʙarxost, to haqro az mijon ʙardorad. Ammo Man onhoro ʙa uquʙat furu giriftam va uquʙati Man ci saxt ʙud
Ba in tarz hukmi Parvardigori tu ʙar kofiron vociʙ sud, ki ahli cahannamand

Onon, ki arsro meʙardorand va onon, ki ʙar girdi on hastand, ʙa sitoisi Parvardigorason tasʙeh, megujand va ʙa U imon dorand va az U ʙaroi mu'minon ʙaxsois mexohand: «Ej Parvardngori mo, rahmatu ilmi Tu hama cizro faro giriftaast. Pas ononro, ki tavʙa kardaand va ʙa rohi tu omadaand, ʙiʙaxs va az azoʙi cahannam nigah dor
Va ej Parvardigori mo, ononro va har ki soleh ʙosad, az padaronu hamsaron va farzandonason ʙa ʙihisthoi covidoni, ki ʙa onho va'da dodai, doxil kun, ki Tu ƣoliʙu hakimi
Ononro az azoʙho hifz kud, ki har kiro dar on ruz az azoʙho hifz kuni, ʙar u rahmat ovardai va on komjoʙii ʙuzurgest!»
Kofironro nido medihand, ki dusmanii Xudo ʙo sumo az dusmanii sumo ʙo xudaton, on goh ki ʙa imonaton da'vat mekardand va rohi kufr pes megirifted, ʙuzurgtar ast
Megujand: «Ej Parvardigori mo, moro du ʙor mirondi va, du ʙor zinda soxti va mo ʙa gunohonamon iqror kardaem. Ojo ʙerun sudanro rohe hast?»

In azoʙ ʙa on saʙaʙ ast, ki cun Xudoro ʙa jaktoi mexondand, sumo inkor mekarded va agar ʙaroi U sarike qaror medodand, sumo ʙa on sarik imon meovarded. Pas farmon farmoni Xudoi ʙalandmartaʙai ʙuzurg ast
Ust, on ki ojoti Xudro ʙa sumo nison dod va ʙarojaton az osmon ruzi firistod. Tanho kase pand megirad, ki ruj ʙa Xudo ovarad
Pas Xudoro ʙixoned, dar hole ki tanho ʙaroi U dar din ixlos mekuned, agarci kofironro noxus ojad
Balandkunandai martaʙaho, sohiʙi ars, ki ʙar har jak az ʙandagonas, ki ʙixohad, ʙa farmoni Xud vahj mefiristad, to mardumro az ruzi qijomat ʙitarsonad
On ruz, ki hamagon oskor savand, hec ciz az onho ʙar Xudo pusida namonad. Dar on ruz farmonravoi az oni kist? Az oni Xudoi jaktoi qahhor
On ruz har kasro monandi amalas cazo medihand va ʙa kas sitame nameravad. Va Xudo zud hisoʙkunanda ast
Az ruzi qijomat ʙitarsonason. On goh ki dilho laʙrez az anduh nazdiki hancarho (guluho) rasad. Sitamkoronro dar on ruz na xesovande ʙosad va na safe'e, (pustiʙon) ki suxanasro ʙisnavand
Nazarhoi duzdidaro va har ci dilho nihon dostaand, medonad
Xudo ʙa haq dovari mekunad. Vale kasone, ki ƣajri U ʙa xudoi mexonand, hec dovari natavonand, zero Xudo mesunavad va meʙinad

Ojo dar zamin sajr namekunand, to ʙingarand, ki oqiʙati pesinijonason ci guna ʙudaast? Tavonoii onho va jodgorihoe, ki dar rui zamin padid ovarda ʙudand, az inho ʙes ʙud. Va Xudo onhoro ʙa cazoi kufrason furu girift va az qahri Xudovandason nigahdorandae naʙud
In ʙa on saʙaʙ ʙud, ki pajomʙaronason ʙo dalelhoi ravsan nazdason omadand, vale inkor kardand va Xudo ham ononro furu girift. Va Xudo nerumand ast va ʙa saxti uquʙat mekunad
Mo Musoro ʙo ojoti Xud va huccate oskor firistodem
ʙa sui Fir'avnu Homon va Qorun. Va guftand, ki u codugare duruƣgust
Cun dini haqro az coniʙi Mo ʙar onho arza dost, guftand: «Pisaroni kasonero, ki ʙa U imon ovardaand, ʙikused va zanonasonro zinda ʙiguzored!» Va hilasozii kofiron dar tariqi ʙarʙodi ʙosad
Fir'avn guft: «Biguzored, Musoro ʙikusam va u Xudoi xudro ʙa jori talaʙad, Metarsam dinatonro digargun kunad jo dar in sarzamin fasode ʙarxezonad
Muso guft: «Man ʙa Parvardigori xud va Parvardigori sumo az har xudpisande, ki ʙa ruzi xisoʙ ʙovar nadorad, panoh meʙaram!»

Va marde mu'min az xonadoni Fir'avn, ki imonasro pinhon dosta ʙud, guft: «Ojo mardero, ki megujad, ki Parvardigori man Xudoi jaktost va ʙo dalelhoi ravsan az coniʙi Parvardigoraton omadaast, mekused? Agar duruƣ megujad, gunohi duruƣas ʙar gardani xudi ust va agar rost megujad, ʙa'ze az va'dahoe, ki dodaast, ʙa sumo xohad rasid, Alʙatta Xudo hec isrofkori duruƣguero hidojat namekunad

Ej qavmi man, imruz farmonravoi az oni sumost. Bar in sarzamin ƣalaʙa dored. Vale agar azoʙi Xudo ʙar sari mo ojad, ci kase jorijamon xohad kard?» Fir'avn guft: «Sumoro ƣajri on ci xud maslihat dodaam, rohe nison nadiham va ʙa ƣajri rohi savoʙ rohnamoi nakunam»
On ki imon ovarda ʙud, guft: «Ej qavmi man, ʙar sumo az on ci ʙar sari on qavmhoi digar omadaast, ʙimnokam (metarsam)
Hamonandi qavmi Nuh va Od va Samud va kasone, ki az on pas omadand. Hol on ki Xudo ʙaroi ʙandagonas xostori zulm nest
Ej qavmi man, az on ruz, ki jakdigarro ʙa farjod ʙixoned, ʙar sumo ʙimnokam
On ruz, ki hamagi pust karda ʙozmegarded va hec kas sumoro az azoʙi Xudo nigoh namedorad. Va har kas, ki Xudo gumrohas kunad, hec rohnamoe nadorad

Jusuf pes az in ʙo daloili ravsan ʙar sumo maʙ'us (firistoda) sud va sumo az on ci ovarda ʙud, hamcunon dar sak meʙuded. Cun Jusuf ʙimurd, gufted: «Xudo pas az u digar pajomʙare naxohad firistod!» Xudo tacovuzkori sakovarandaro in guna gumroh mesozad

Kasone, ki ʙe hec hucate, ki dar dast dosta ʙosand, dar ojoti Xudo cidol mekunand. Kori onon nazdi Xudovu mu'minon saxt nopisand ast. Xudo ʙar dili har mutakaʙʙiri (xudro az digaron ʙolotar donandai) caʙʙore incunin mudr menihad
Fir'avn guft: «Ej Homon, ʙaroi man qal'ai ʙalande ʙisoz, sojad ʙa on darho dast joʙam
darhoi osmonho. Va Xudoi Musoro ʙuʙinam, zero pindoram, ki duruƣ megujad». Ba in son kirdori zisti Fir'avn dar nazaras orosta sud va u az roh ʙozmond va coracuii u ƣajri zijon hec naʙud
On marde, ki imon ovarda ʙud, guft: «Ej qavmi man, az pai man ʙijoed, to ʙa rohi savoʙ hidojataton kunam
Ej qavmi man, in zindagii dunjo ʙearzisu ta'ajjusest (xusguzaroniest). Va oxirat saroi ʙaqost (ʙoqi)
Har kas kori ʙade ʙikunad, faqat monandi amalas cazo joʙad. Va har kas az mardu zan, ki mu'min ʙosad va amali solehe ʙa coj orad, ʙa ʙihist doxil savad va ʙehisoʙ ruzias dihand
Ej qavmi man, cist, ki man sumoro ʙa nacot mexonam va sumo maro ʙa otas da'vat mekuned
Maro da'vat mekuned, ki ʙa Xudo kofir savam va cizero, ki namesinosam, sariki U qaror diham, hol on ki man sumoro ʙa Xudoi ƣoliʙi ʙaxsojanda da'vat mekunam
Besak on ci sumo maro ʙa on da'vat mekuned, tavonoi onas nest, ki dar dunjovu oxirat kasero ʙa sui xud xonad, hol on ki ʙozgasti mo ʙa sui Xudoi jaktost va tacovuzkoron dar cahannam ʙosand
Ba zudi on ciro, ki aknun megujam, ʙa jod xohed ovard. Va man kori xud ʙa Xudo havola kardam, zero U ʙandagonasro meʙinad!»
Xudo uro az oseʙi makre, ki ʙarojas andesida ʙudand, nigoh dost va on azoʙi noguvor xonadoni Fir'avnro dar mijon girift
Otas. Har suʙhu som ʙar on arza savand va ruze, ki qijomat ʙarpo savad, nido dihand ki xonadoni Fir'avnro ʙa saxttarin azoʙho darovared!»
Va on goh dar daruni otas ʙo jakdigar ʙa mucodala ʙarxezand va notavonon ʙa gardankason gujand, ki mo pajravoni sumo ʙudem, ojo metavoned andake az in otase, ki nasiʙi mo sudaast, kam kuned
Onon, ki sarkasi karda ʙudand, megujand: «Hamai mo dar otasem. Va Xudost, ki mijoni ʙandagonas dovari kardaast!»
Va onon, ki dar otasand, ʙa nigahʙononi cahannam megujand: «Az Parvardigoraton ʙixohed, to jak ruz az azoʙi mo kam kunad»
Megujand: «Ojo pajomʙaronaton ʙo dalelhoi ravsan nazdi sumo najomada ʙudand?» Megujand: «Bale». Megujand: «Pas du'o kuned». Va du'oi kofiron, ƣajri on ki ʙarʙod ravad, cize digar naxohad ʙud
Mo pajomʙaronamon va mu'minonro dar zindagii dunjo va dar ruzi qijomat, ki sohidon ʙaroi sohidi rost meistand, jori mekunem
dar ruze, ki sitamkoronro puzis (uzr) xostan naf' nadihad va nasiʙi onho la'nat ast va on saroi (makoni) ʙad
Mo ʙa Muso martaʙai hidojat dodem va on kitoʙro (tavrotro) ʙa ʙani-Isroil meros dodem
Kitoʙe, ki xud hidojat ast va ʙaroi xiradmandon andarz (pand)
Saʙr kun, ki va'dai Xudo haq ast. Baroi gunohat ʙaxsois ʙixoh va har somgohu ʙomdod ʙa sitoisi Parvardigorat tasʙeh ʙiguj

Onon, ki ʙe hec huccate, ki az osmon omada ʙosad, dar ʙorai ojoti Xudo mucodala mekunand, dar dilason ƣajri havasi ʙuzurgi nest, vale ʙa on naxohand rasid. Pas ʙa Xudo panoh ʙiʙar, ki U sunavovu ʙinost
Ofarinisi osmonu zamin az ofarinisi mardum ʙuzurgtar ast, vale ʙestari mardum namedonand
Noʙinovu ʙino ʙaroʙar nestand. Niz onhoe, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ʙo zistkoron jakson naʙosand. Ci andak pand megired
Qijomat meojad va dar on suʙhae nest, vale ʙestari mardum imon nameovarand
Parvardigoraton guft: «Duovu iltico kuned Maro, to sumoro icoʙat kunam. Onhoe, ki az parastisi Man sarkasi mekunand, ʙa zudi dar ajni xori ʙa cahannam darojand!»
Xudost, on ki saʙro ʙarojaton ofarid, to dar on ʙijoromed va ruzro ravsanoi ʙaxsid. Xudo fazli xud ʙa mardum arzoni medorad. Vale ʙestari mardum sukrkunanda nestand
In ast Xudoi jakto — Parvardigori sumo, ofaridgorn har cize. Xudoe ƣajri U nest. Pas ci guna az haq ʙerohaton mekunand
Hamcunin inho, ki ojoti Xudoro inkor mekunand, az imon ruj ʙarmegardonand

Xudost, ki zaminro qarorgohi sumo soxt va osmonro cun ʙinoe ʙardost. Va sumoro surat ʙaxsid va surathojatonro neku soxt. Va az cizhoi pokizavu xus ruzijaton dod. In ast Xudoi jakto — Parvardigori sumo. Bartaru ʙuzurgvor ast Xudo — on Parvardigori cahonijon
U zinda ast, Xudoe ƣajri U nest. Uro iʙodat kuned, dar hole, ki dini Uro ʙa ixlos pazirufta ʙosed, ki sitois (sukru zikri nek) az oni Xudoest, ki Parvardigori cahonijon ast

Bigu: «Maro man' kardaand, ki cizhoero, ki ʙa coi Xudo meparasted, parastis kunam, dar hole, ki az coniʙi Parvardigoram ʙaroi man daloile ravsan omadaast. Va ʙa man farmon dodaand, ki dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigori cahonijon taslim ʙosam»

Ust on Xudoe, ki sumoro az xok, sipas az nutfa, sipas az laxtai xune ʙijofaridaast. On goh sumoro, dar surati kudake ʙarovard, to ʙa sinni cavoni ʙirased va pir saved. Ba'ze az sumo pes az piri ʙimired va ʙa'ze ʙa on zamoni mu'ajjan merased va sojad ʙa aql darjoʙed
Ust, ki zinda mekunad va memironad. Va cun irodai cize kunad, megujadas: «Mavcud sav!» Pas mavcud mesavad
Ojo nadidai onhoe, ki dar ojoti Xudo kasmakas mekunand, ci guna kacrav mesavand
Kasone, ki in kitoʙro duruƣ mesumorand va on ciro, ki ʙa vasilai pajomʙaron firistodaem, takziʙ mekunand (duruƣ meʙarorand), ʙa zudi xohand donist
on goh ki tavqhoro ʙa gardanason andozand va ʙo zancirho ʙikasandason
dar oʙi cuson, sipas dar otas afruxta savand
On goh ʙa onho gufta savad: «On sarikon, ki ʙaroi Xudo megirifted, kuco hastand?»
Megujand: «Onhoro az dast dodaem, ʙalki pes az in cizero ʙa xudoi namexondaem». Xudo kofironro ʙa in tarz gumroh mekunad
In ʙa on saʙaʙ ast, ki ʙa nohaq dar zamin sodmoni mekarded va nozu karasma mekarded
Az darhoi cahannam doxil saved. Hamesa dar on co ʙimoned. Va cojgohi sarkason ci ʙad cojgohest
Pas saʙr kun, alʙatta, va'dai Xudo rost ast. E ʙa'ze az on cizhoro, ki ʙa onho va'da dodaem, ʙa tu nison medihem jo turo ʙimironem va onho ʙa nazdi Mo ʙozgardonida savand

Pes az tu pajomʙarone firistodaem. Dostoni ʙa'zero ʙarojat guftaem va dostoni ʙa'zero naguftaem. Va hec pajomʙarero narasad, ki ojate ʙijovarad, magar ʙa farmoni Xudo. Va cun farmoni Xudo darrasad, ʙa haq dovari gardad va onon, ki ʙar ʙotil ʙudaand, on co, zijon xohand did
Xudost, ki corpojonro ʙarojaton ofarid, to ʙar ʙa'ze savor saved va az ʙa'ze ʙixured
Va sumoro dar on manfiathost va metavoned ʙo onho ʙa hocate, ki dar nazar dored, ʙirased. Va ʙar onho va ʙar kistiho savor saved
Ojoti xudro ʙar sumo menamojonad. Pas kadom jak az ojoti Xudoro inkor mekuned

Ojo dar zamin sajr nakardaand, to ʙingarand, ki oqiʙati kasone, ki pes az onho mezistaand, ci guna ʙudaast? Mardume, ki quvvatason ʙestar va osorason dar rui zamin farovontar ʙud. Pas on cizhoe, ki ʙa dast meovardand, foida naʙaxsid
Cun pajomʙaronason ʙo dalelhoi ravsan ʙa sujason omadand, ʙa donisi xud dilxus ʙudand, to on cize, ki masxaraas mekardand, onhoro dar mijon girift
Va cun azoʙi Moro didand, guftand: «Ba Xudoi jakto imon ovardem va ʙa on cizhoe, ki sariki Xudo qaror doda ʙudem kofir sudem»
Ammo ʙa on hangom, ki azoʙi Moro didand, digar imonason ʙarojason sude naʙaxsid, In sunnati Xudost dar raftor ʙo ʙandagonas. Va kofiron dar on ruz zijon kardand
Ho, mim
Kitoʙest, ki az coniʙi On ʙaxsojandai mehruʙon nozil sudaast
Kitoʙest, ki ojahojas ʙa tafsilu fahmo ʙajon suda, Qur'onest ʙa zaʙoni araʙi ʙaroi mardume, ki medonand
Ham muƶdadihanda ast va ham ʙimdihanda. Bestarason az on e'roz kardaand (ruj gardondaand) va suxan namesunavand
Guftand: «Dilhoi mo az on ci moro ʙa on da'vat mekuni, dar parda ast va gushojamon sangin ast va mijoni movu tu hicoʙest. Tu ʙa kori xud pardoz va mo niz ʙa kori xud mepardozem»
Bigu: «Man insone hastam hamonandi sumo. Ba man vahj suda, ki xudojaton Xudoest jakto. Pas ʙa u ruj ovared va az U ʙaxsois ʙixohed. Va voj ʙar musrikon
onhoe, ki zakot namedihand va ʙa oxirat imon nadorand
Ononro, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista mekunand, podosest (mukofotest) tamomnosudani»
Bigu: «Ojo ʙa kase, ki zaminro dar du ruz ofaridaast, kofir mesaved va ʙaroi U sarikho qaror medihed? Ust Parvardigori cahonijon
Bar rui zamin kuhho padid ovard va onro purʙarakat soxt va rizqi hamaro mu'ajjan kard dar cahor ruz jakson ʙaroi hamai pursandagon
Sipas ʙa osmon pardoxt va on dude ʙud. Pas ʙa osmonu zamin guft: «Xoh jo noxoh ʙijoed». Guftand: «Farmonʙardor omadem»
On goh haft osmonro dar du ruz ofarid. Va dar har osmone korasro ʙa on vahj kard. Va osmoni dunjoro ʙa caroƣhoe ʙijorostem va hifzas kardem. In ast tadʙiri On ƣoliʙi dono»
Pas agar ruj gardonand, ʙigu: «Sumoro az ra'du ʙarqe hamonandi ra'du ʙarqe, ki ʙar Odu Samud furud omad, metarsonam

On goh ki rasuloni pes va ʙa'di onho navdason omadand va guftand, ki ƣajri Xudoi jaktoro maparasted, guftand: «Agar Parvardigori mo mexost, faristagonro az osmon mefarovard. Mo ʙa on ci sumo ʙo on firistoda sudaed, imon nameovarem»

Ammo qavmi Od ʙa nohaq dar, rui zamin gardankasi kardand va guftand: «Ci kase az mo ʙoquvvat tar ast?» Ojo namedidand, ki Xudoe, ki onhoro ofaridaast, az onho ʙo quvvattar ast, ki ojoti Moro inkor mekardand
Mo niz ʙode saxtu ƣurron dar ruzhoe sum ʙar sarason firistodem, to dar dunjo azoʙi xoriro ʙa onho ʙicasonem. Va azoʙi oxirat xorkunandatar ast va kase ʙa joriason ʙarnaxezad
Ammo qavmi Samud, hidojatason kardem. Va onho kuriro az hidojat ʙestar dust medostand, to on ki ʙa xotiri amalhoe, ki mekardand, so'iqai azoʙi xorkunanda onhoro furu girift
Va Mo kasonero, ki imon ovarda ʙudand va parhezgor ʙudand, nacot dodem
Va ruze, ki dusmanoni Xudoro gird ovarand va ʙa saf ʙironandason
cun ʙa kanori otas ojand, gusu casmho va pusthoson ʙa amalhoe, ki kardaand, ʙar ziddason sohidi dihand
Ba pusthoi xud gujand: «Caro ʙar ziddi mo sohidi doded?» Gujand: «On Xudoe, ki har cizero ʙa suxan meovarad va sumoro naxustin ʙor ʙijofarid va ʙa U ʙozgast mejoʙed, moro ʙa suxan ovardaast»
Az in ki gusu casmho va pusthojaton ʙa zijoni sumo sohidi dihand, cize nihon namedosted, ʙalki mepindosted, ki Xudo ʙar ʙisjore az korhoe, ki mekuned, ogoh nest
Va in ʙud gumone, ki ʙa Parvardigoraton dosted. Halokaton kard va dar sumori zijonkardagon daromaded
Pas agar saʙr kunand, cojgohason dar otas ast va agar ham toliʙi afv savand, kase onhoro afv nakunad
Ba ʙarojason hamdamone muqarrar kardem va onon holu ojandaro dar nazarason ʙijorostand. Va ʙar onho niz monandi pesinijonason az cinnu ins azoʙ muqarrar sud. Zero zijonkor ʙudand
Kofiron guftand: «Ba in Qur'on gus madihed va suxani ʙehuda ʙa on ʙijomezed, sojad piruz garded!»
Kofironro azoʙe saxt mecasonem va ʙadtar az on ci mekardaand, podos medihem
In ast kajfari (cazoi) dusmanoni Xudo otas. Dar daruni on xonae hamesagi dorand. In cazoi onhost, zero ojoti Moro inkor mekardand
Kofiron gujand: «Ej Parvardigori mo, on du tanro az cinnu ins, ki moro gumroh kardand, ʙa mo ʙinamojon, to poj ʙar sari onho nihem, to az mo pasttar (pojontar) ravand!»
Bar onon, ki guftand: «Parvardigori mju Olloh ast» va pojdori kardaand, faristagon furud meojand, ki metarsed va ƣamgin naʙosed, sumoro ʙa ʙihiste, ki ʙa sumo va'da doda suda, xusxaʙar ast
Mo dar dunjo dustoni sumo ʙudem va niz dar oxirat dustdori sumoem. Dar ʙihist har ci dilaton ʙixohad va har ci talaʙ kuned, ʙarojaton faroham ast
Mehmonnavozist az coniʙi Xudoi ʙaxsojandai mehruʙon
Ci kasero suxan nekutar az suxani on, ki ʙa sui Xudo da'vat mekunad va korhoi soista mekunad va megujad, alʙatta, ki man az musalmononam
Xuʙivu ʙadi ʙaroʙar nestand. Hamesa ʙa nekutarin tarze cavoʙ deh, to kase, ki mijoni tuvu u dusmani ast, cun dusti mehruʙoni tu gardad
Barxurdor nasavand az in ƣajri kasone, ki ʙosaʙr ʙosand va kasone, ki az imon ʙahrae ʙuzurg dosta ʙosand
Va agar az coniʙi sajton giriftori vasvasae gardi, ʙa Xudo panoh ʙiʙar, ki U sunavovu donost
Va az nisonahoi qudrati U saʙu ruz va oftoʙu moh ast. Ba oftoʙu moh sacda makuned. Ba Xudoi jakto, ki onhoro ofaridaast, sacda kuned, agar Uro meparasted
Agar onon takaʙʙur mevarzand, onho, ki dar nazdi Parvardigori tu hastand, ʙe on ki malul sadand saʙu ruz tasʙehi U megujand (Sacda)
Va az ojoti qudrati U on, ki tu zaminro xusk meʙini. Cun oʙ ʙar on ʙifiristem, ʙa cunʙis ojad va gijoh ʙirujonad. On kas, ki onro zinda mekunad, zindakunandai murdagon ast, ki U ʙar har cize tavonost

Kasone, ki dar ojoti Mo rohi ʙotil pes megirand, ʙar Mo pusida nestand. Ojo on ki ʙa otas afkanda mesavad, ʙehtar ast jo on ki ruzi qijomat ʙe hec vahsate meojad? Harci mexohed ʙikuned, U ʙa korhojaton ʙinost
Ba cazoi xud rasand onon, ki ʙa Qur'on, ki ʙaroi hidojatason omadaast, imon nameovarand, hol on ki kitoʙe arcmand ast
Na az pesi ruj ʙotil ʙa u roh joʙad va na az pas. Nozilsuda az coniʙi Xudovande hakimu sutudanist. (loiqi sukru sipos ast)
Har ci dar ʙorai tu megujand, dar ʙorai pajomʙaroni pes az tu niz guftaand. Alʙatta Parvardigori tu ham ʙaxsojanda ast va ham sohiʙi uquʙatest dardovar

Agar Qur'onro ʙa zaʙoni Acam mefiristodem, meguftand: «Caro ojotas ʙa ravsani ʙajon nasudaast? Kitoʙe ʙa zaʙoni Acam va pajomʙare araʙ?» Bigu: «In kitoʙ ʙaroi onho, ki imon ovardand, hidojat va sifost va onho, ki imon naovardand, gushojason sangin ast va casmonason kur ast, cunonand, ki gui onhoro az coe dur sado mekunand
Musoro kitoʙ dodem, ammo dar on ixtilof kardand. Va agar on suxane, ki Parvardigorat az pes gufta ʙud, nameʙud mijonason kor ʙa pojon meomad. Va, alʙatta, hanuz ʙa saxti dar suʙhaand
Har kas, ki kore soista kunad, ʙa foidai xudi ust va har ki ʙad kunad, ʙa zijoni ust. Va Parvardigori tu ʙa ʙandagon zulm ravo namedorad

Ilm ʙa ruzi qijomat nazdi Ust. Va har mevae az ƣilofi xud ʙerun meojad va har modae homilador mesavadu mezojad, alʙatta ki U ʙa on ogoh ast. Va on ruz, ki onhoro nido dihad, ki sarikoni Man kucojand? Gujand: Ogohat kardem, ki kase az mo ʙa sirk guvohi namedihad
Va on ciro pes az in ʙa, xudoi mexondand, az dast dodand va donistand, ki rohi gureze nadorand
Odami har ci talaʙi xajr kunad, xasta namesavad, ammo cun ʙadi ʙa u ʙirasad, ʙadandesu noumed megardad

Agar pas az rance, ki ʙa u rasida, rahmate ʙa u ʙicasonem, megujad: «In haqqi man ast va napindoram, ki qijomate ʙarpo savad. Va agar ham maro nazdi Parvardigoram ʙargardonand, alʙatta, ki nazdi U holate xustar ʙosad». Pas kofironro ʙa amalhoe, ki kardaand, ogoh mekunem va ʙa onho azoʙe saxt mecasonem
Cun ʙa odami ne'mate ato kunem, rujgardon mesavad va ʙa takaʙʙur gardan ʙolo mekunad. Va agar ʙa u ʙadie ʙirasad, ʙisjor farjodu fiƣon mekunad
Bigu: «Ci meʙined?» Agar in kitoʙ az coniʙi Xudost va sumo ʙa on imon nameovared, gumrohtar az kase, ki hamcunon rohi muxolifat (ziddijat) dar pes giriftaast, kist
Ba zudi, ojoti qudrati Xudro dar atrofi olam va dar vucudi xudason ʙa onho nison xohem dod, to ʙarojason oskor savad, ki, U haq ast. Ojo in ki Parvardigori tu dar hama co hozir ast, kofi nest
Bahus (ogoh) ʙos, ki onho az didori Parvardigorason dar suʙhaand. Bahus ʙos, ki U ʙar har cize ihota dorad
Ho, mim
Ajn, sin, qof
Xudovandi ƣoliʙu hakim ʙa tu va kasone, ki pes az tu ʙudand, incunin vahj mefiristad
az oni Ust, har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast. Va Ust on ʙalandmartaʙai ʙuzurgvor

Nazdik ast, ki osmonho ʙa ʙoloi jakdigar dar ham sikanand va faristagon ʙa sitoisi Parvardigorason tasʙeh megujand va ʙaroi sokinoni zamin ʙaxsois metalaʙand. Ogoh ʙosed, ki Xudo ʙaxsojandavu mehruʙon ast
Xudo muroqiʙi (noziri) a'moli kasonest, ki ƣajri Uro ʙa dusti giriftand. Va tu vakili onho nesti

Va niz in Qur'onro ʙa zaʙoni araʙi ʙar tu vahj kardem to ummulquro va sokinoni atrofasro ʙim dihj. Hamcunin ononro az ruzi qijomat, ki dar on sakke nest, ʙitarsoni, ki guruhe dar ʙihistand va guruhe dar otasi suzon
Agar Xudo mexost, hamaro jak ummat karda ʙud. Vale U har kiro ki ʙixohad, ʙa rahmati xud darovarad va sitamkoronro hec dustu jovare nest
Ojo ƣajri Xudoro ʙa dusti giriftand? Dusti haqiqi Xudost. Va Ust, ki murdagonro zinda mekunad va Ust, ki ʙar har kore tavonost
Dar har ci ixtilof mekuned, hukmas ʙo Xudost. In Xudoi jakto Parvardigori man ast. Bar U tavakkal kardam va ʙa U ruj meovaram

Ofaridgori osmonhovu zamin ast. Baroi sumo, ham az sumo hamsarone ʙijofarid. Va niz ʙaroi corpojon cufthoe padid ovard. Vo ofarinisi hamsaron ʙar sumoraton meafzojad. Hec ciz monandi U nest va Ust, ki sunavovu ʙinost
Kalidhoi osmonhovu zamin az oni Ust. Dar ruzii har ki ʙixohad, kusois medihad jo tang megirad va U ʙa har cize donost

Baroi sumo dinu oine muqarrar kard az hamon guna, ki ʙa Nuh tavsija karda ʙud va az on ci ʙar tu vahj kardaem va ʙa Iʙrohimu Muso va Iso tavsija kardaem, ki dinro ʙarpoj nigah dored va dar on firqa-firqa masaved. Tahammuli on ci ʙa on da'vat mekuned, ʙar musrikon dusvor ast. Xudo har kiro xohad, ʙaroi pajƣamʙarii Xud intixoʙ mekunad va har kiro ʙa u ʙozgardad, ʙa Xud roh menamojad

Az rui hasadu adovat firqa-firqa sudand, az on pas, ki ʙa donis dast joftand. Va agar Parvardigori tu az pes muqarrar nakarda ʙud, ki onhoro to zamone mu'ajjan muhlat ast, ʙar onho hukmi azoʙ meraft. Va kasone, ki ʙa'd az onho vorisi kitoʙi Xudo sudaand, dar ʙorai on saxt ʙa suʙha aftodaand

Baroi on da'vat kun va cunon ki farmon joftai, pojdori kun va az pai xohishojason marav va ʙigu: «Ba kitoʙe, ki Xudo nozil kardaast, imon doram va ʙa man farmon dodaand, ki dar mijoni sumo ʙa adolat raftor kunam. Xudoi jakto Parvardigori mo va Parvardigori sumost. A'moli mo az oni mo va a'moli sumo az oni sumo. Mijonu movu sumo hec muhoccae (dusmanie) nest. Xudo moro dar jak co cam' meovarad va ʙozgast ʙa sui Ust!»
Va kasone, ki dar ʙorai Xudo cidol mekunand, pas az on ki da'vati Uro icoʙat kardaand, nazdi Parvardigorason huccatason nociz ast. Bar onhost xasmi Xudo va ʙar onhost azoʙe saxt
Xudost, ki in kitoʙi ʙarxaq va tarozuro nozil kardaast. Va tu ci medoni? Sojad qijomat nazdik ʙosad

Onon, ki ʙovaras nadorand, (omadani) onro ʙa sitoʙ metalaʙand va onon, ki imon ovardaand, az on ʙimnokand va medonand, ki haq ast. Ogoh ʙos, kasone, ki dar ʙorai qijomat cidol mekunand, saxt dar gumrohi hastand
Xudo ʙo ʙandagonas mehruʙon ast. Har kiro ʙixohad, ruzi medihad. Va U tavonovu ƣoliʙ ast
Har kas kisti oxiratro ʙixohad, ʙa kistaas meafzoem va har kas kisti dunjoro ʙixohad, ʙa u ato mekunem, vale digar dar kisti oxiratas nasiʙe nest

Ojo musrikonro ʙutonest, ki dine ʙarojason ovardaand, ki Xudo ruxsati onro nadodaast? Va agar qasdi ta'xiri (ʙa der partoftani) azoʙason naʙud, korason ʙa pojon omada ʙud va sitamkoronro azoʙest dardovar

Sitamkoronro ʙini, ki az hosili korhojason ʙimnokand. Va alʙatta, ʙa cazoi xud xohand rasid. Vale onho, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, dar ʙoƣhoi ʙihistand. Har ci ʙixohand, nazdi Parvardigorason hast. Va in fazlu ʙaxsoisti ʙuzurgest

In ast on cize, ki Xudo on guruh az ʙandagokasro, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ʙa on muƶda medihad. Bigu: «Bar on taʙliƣi Qur'on muzde az sumo cuz dust dostani xesovandon namexoham». Va har ki kori neke kunad, ʙa nekuijas meafzoem, zero Xudo ʙaxsojandavu sukrpazir ast
Jo megujand, ki ʙar Xudo duruƣ meʙandad. Agar Xudo ʙixohad, ʙar dili tu muhr menihad. Va Xudo ʙa kaligmoti xud ʙotilro mahv mekunad va haqro soʙit megardonad. U ʙar har ci dar dilho meguzarad, donost
Va Ust, ki tavʙai ʙandagonasro mepazirad va az gunohon afvason mekunad va har ci mekuned, medonad
Va duʹoi kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, icoʙat mekunad va az fazli xud ononro ʙisjor medihad. Va kofironro azoʙe saxt ast
Agar Xudo ruzii ʙandagonasro ʙisjor kunad, dar zamin fasod mekunand, vale ʙa miqdore, ki ʙixohad, ruzi mefiristad. Zero ʙar ʙandagoni xud ogohu ʙinost
Va Ust on Xudoe, ki ʙa'd az noumedijason ʙoron mefiristad va rahmati Xudro ʙa hama co parokanda mekunad va Ust korsozu sohiʙi hamdu sano
Va az nisonahoi qudrati U ofarinisi osmonhovu zamin va parokandani cunʙandagon dar on dust. Va har goh ʙixohad, ʙar cam' ovardanason tavonost
Agar sumoro musiʙate rasad, ʙa xotiri korhoest, ki kardaed. Va Xudo ʙisjore az gunohonro afv mekunad
Sumo natavoned dar rui zamin az U ʙigurezed va sumoro ƣajri U korsozu jovare nest
Az nisonahoi qudrati U kistihoest cun kuh ki dar darjoho ravonand
Agar ʙixohad, ʙodro nigah medorad, to kistiho ʙar rui darjo az raftan ʙozmonand. Alʙatta dar in ʙaroi saʙrkunandagoni sukrguzor iʙrathoest
Jo onhoro ʙa xotiri amalhojason ƣark mekunad va ʙisjorero niz meʙaxsojad
Va to ʙidonand, kasone, ki dar ojoti Mo cidol mekunand. Ononro hec gurezgohe nest
On ci sumoro dodaand, ʙahrai in zindagii dunjavist. Va on ci dar nazdi Xudost, ʙaroi onho, ki imon ovardaand va ʙa Parvardigorason tavakkal mekunand, ʙehtaru pojandatar ast
Va on kasone, ki az gunohoni ʙuzurg va zistiho parhez mekunand va cun dar xasm savand, xatohoro meʙaxsojand
va onon, ki da'vati Parvardigorasonro qaʙul mekunand va namoz meguzorand va korason ʙar pojai masvarat ʙo jakdigar ast va az on ci ʙa onho ruzi dodaem, sadaqa mekunand
va onon, ki cun sitame ʙa onho rasad, intiqom megirand
Cazoi har ʙadi ʙadiest monandi on. Pas kase, ki afv kunad va osti kunad, muzdas ʙo Xudost, zero U sitamkoronro dust nadorad
Bar kasone, ki pas az zulme, ki ʙar onho rafta ʙosad, intiqom megirand, malomate nest
Malomat ʙar kasonest, ki ʙa mardum zulm mekunand va ʙa nohaq dar rui zamin sarkasi mekunand. Baroi onhost azoʙe dardovar
Va on ki saʙr kunad va az xato darguzarad, in az korhoi pisandida ast
Har kasro, ki Xudo gumroh kunad, az on pas hec duste naxohad dost. Va zolimonro meʙini, ki cun azoʙro ʙingarand, megujand: «Ojo moro rohi ʙozgaste hast?»

Onhoro meʙini, ki ʙa cahannam meʙarand. Tarsonu xor az gusai casm nigohe duzdida mekunand. Kasone, ki imon ovarda ʙudand, megujand: «Inho xud va kasonasonro dar ruzi qijomat ʙarʙod dodand». Ogoh ʙos, ki sitamkoron dar azoʙi doim xohand ʙud
Ƣajri Xudo joru madadgore nadorand va har kasro, ki Xudo gumroh kunad, hec rohe ʙarojas nest
Pes az on ki ruze ʙijojad, ki az coniʙi Xudo ʙozgaste nadorad, ʙa Parvardigoraton cavoʙi qaʙul dihed. Dar on ruz na panohe xohed dost va na kase az sumo muhofizat tavonad kard

Agar ruj gardonand, turo nafiristodaem, ki nigahʙonason ʙosi. Bar tu ƣajri rasonidani pajƣom hec nest. Va Mo cun ʙa inson az rahmati Xud ʙicasonem, sodmon megardad va agar ʙa xotiri korhoe, ki kardaast, noravoi ʙa u rasad, nosiposi mekunad
Az oni Xudost farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin. Har ci ʙixohad, meofarinad. Ba har ki ʙixohad, duxtar meʙaxsad va ʙa har ki ʙixohad, pisar meʙaxsad
Va jo ham pisar dihad va ham duxtar. Va har kasro ʙixohad, aqim (nozo) megardonad, zero U donovu tavonost
Hec ʙasarero narasad, ki Xudo cuz ʙa vahj jo az on sui parda ʙo u suxan gujad. Jo faristae mefiristad to ʙa farmoni U har ci ʙixohad, ʙa u vahj kunad. U ʙalandpojavu hakim ast

Hamcunin kalomi Xudro ʙa farmoni Xud ʙa tu vahj kardem. Tu namedonisti kitoʙu imon cist. Vale Mo onro nure soxtem to har jak az ʙandagonamonro, ki ʙixohem, ʙa on hidojat kunem va tu ʙa rohi rost roh nison medihi
rohi on Xudoe, ki az oni Ust har ci dar osmonhovu zamin ast. Ogoh ʙosed, ki hamai korho ʙa Xudo ʙozmegardad
Ho, mim
Savgand ʙa in kitoʙi ravsangar
Mo in kitoʙro Qur'one araʙi qaror dodem, ʙosad, ki ʙa aql darjoʙed
Va on dar ummulkitoʙ ast dar nazdi Mo: kitoʙe arcmandu hikmatomez
Ojo ʙa on saʙaʙ, ki mardume az had guzasta hasted, az sumo ruj gardonem va Qur'onro az sumo dareƣ dorem
Ba mijoni pesinijon pajomʙaroni ʙisjore firistodem
Va hec pajomʙare ʙar onho firistoda namesud, ki masxaraas nakarda ʙosand
Onhoro, ki az onho ʙoquvvattar ʙudand, halok kardem. Va dostoni pesinijon guzast
Agar az onho ʙipursi: «Ci kase osmonhovu zaminro ofaridaast?» Megujand: «Onhoro on ƣoliʙi dono ofaridaast!»
On ki zaminro ʙisoti sumo soxt va ʙarojaton rohho dar on padid ovard, ʙosad, ki hidojat saved
Va on ki az osmon oʙ firistod ʙa miqdor. Va ʙa on sarzamini murdaro zinda kardem. Sumo niz incunin az gurho ʙerun ovarda saved
va on ki hamai cufthoro ʙijofarid. Va ʙarojaton az kistiho va corpojon markaʙho soxt, ki savor saved
Va cun ʙar pusti onho qaror girifted, ne'mati Parvardigoratonro jod kuned va ʙigued: «Pok ast on kas, ki inhoro romi mo kard, vagarna moro tavoni on naʙud
Va mo ʙa sui Parvardigoramon ʙozmegardem»
Va ʙaron U az mijoni ʙandagonas farzande qoil sudand. Odami ʙa oskoro nosipos (nosukr) ast
Ojo U az mijoni maxluqonas ʙaroi Xud duxtaron ʙargirifta va pisaronro xosi sumo kardaast
Va cun ʙa jake az onho muƶdai tavalludi hamon cizero dihand, ki ʙa Xudoi rahmon nisʙat doda, rujas sijoh gardad va pur az xasm savad
Ojo on ki ʙa orois parvaris jofta (ja'ne duxtar) va dar hangomi cidol oskor namegardad, az oni Xudost
Va faristagonro, ki ʙandagoni Xudojand, zan pindostand. Ojo ʙa hangomi ofarinisason on co hozir ʙudaand? Ba zudi in sohidiasonro menavisand va az onho ʙozxost mesavad
Guftand: «Agar Xudoi rahmon mexost, mo faristagonro nameparastidem». On ci megujand, az rui nodonist va ƣajri ʙa duruƣ suxan namegujand
Ojo pes az Qur'on kitoʙe ʙarojason nozil kardaem, ki aknun ʙa on cang mezanand? (pajravi mekunand)
Na, megujand: «Padaronamonro ʙar dine joftem va mo az pai onho meravem»
Va on tavr pes az tu ʙa kadom dehae ʙimdihandae firistodem, mutana'imonas (sohiʙne'matonas) guftand: «Padaronamonro ʙar dine joftem va mo ʙa amalhoi onho iqtido (panravi) mekunem»
Guft: «Hatto agar ʙaroi sumo cize ʙijovaram, ki az on ci padaronatonro ʙar on jofta ʙuded, hidojatkunandatar ʙosad?» Guftand: «Mo ʙa dine, ki sumoro ʙa on firistodaand, ʙeimonem»
Pas az onho intiqom giriftem. Va ʙingar, ki oqiʙati duruƣʙarorandagon ci guna ʙudaast
Va Iʙrohim ʙa padaru qavmas guft: «Man az on ci sumo meparasted, ʙezoram
ƣajri on ki maro ofarida, ki U rohnamoijam xohad kard»
Va in suxanro dar farzandoni xud suxane pojanda kard, ʙosad, ki ʙa Xudo ʙozgardand
Va Man inhovu padaronasonro az zindagi ʙahramand kardam, to on goh ki haq va pajomʙare ravsangar ʙa sujason omad
Cun haq ʙar onho oskor sud, guftand: «In codust va mo ʙa on imon nameovarem»
Guftand: «Caro in Qur'on ʙar marde az ʙuzurgmardoni on du deha nozil nasudaast?»

Ojo onon rahmati Parvardigoratro taqsim mekunand? Xol on ki mo ruzii onhoro dar in zindagii dunjo mijonason taqsim mekunem. Va ʙa'zero ʙa martaʙa ʙolotar az ʙa'ze digar qaror dodaem, to ʙa'ze ʙa'zi digarro ʙa xidmat girand. Va rahmati Parvardigorat az on ci onho cam' meovarand, ʙehtar ast
Va agar na on ʙud, ki hamai mardum jak ummat namesudand, saqfhoi xonahoi kasonero, ki Xudoi rahmonro ʙovar nadorand, az nuqra mekardem va ʙar onho nardʙonhoe, menihodem, to ʙar on ʙolo ravand
Va ʙaroi xonahojason niz darhoe az nuqra mekardem va taxthoe, ki ʙar onho takja zanand
va az har guna zinat. Va hamai inho ʙahramandii nocizi dunjavist, hol on ki oxirat dar nazdi Parvardigori tu ʙaroi parhezgoron ast
Har kas, ki az jodi Xudoi rahmon ruj gardonad, sajtone ʙar u oʙasta mekunem,, ki hameosa hamrohas ʙosad
Va on sajtonho ononro az rohi Xudo ʙozmegardonand, vale pindorand, ki hidojatjoftagonand
To on goh ki nazdi Mo ojad, megujad: «Ej kos, durii manu tu (misli) durii masriqu maƣriʙ ʙud. Va tu ci hamrohi ʙade ʙudi»
Cun sitam karded, on ruz pusajmoni foida nakunad va har du dar azoʙ sarik ʙosed
Ojo tu mexohi ʙa karon suxan ʙisunavoni jo kuron va onhoero, ki dar gumrohii oskor hastand, roh nison dihi
Va agar turo ʙiʙarem, az onho intiqom megirem
Jo on azoʙero, ki ʙa onho va'da dodaem, ʙa tu nison medihem, ki Mo ʙar onho tavono hastem
Pas dar on ci ʙa tu vahj sudaast, cang ʙizan, (pajravi kun), ki tu ʙar rohi rost hasti
Va Qur'on saʙaʙi ʙalandovoza gastani tu va qavmi tust va ʙa zudi ʙozxost saved
Az pajomʙaroni Mo, ki pes az tu firistodaem, ʙipurs: «Ojo ƣajri Xudoi rahmon digarero ʙaroi parastisi onho qaror doda ʙudem?»
Va alʙatta Musoro hamroh ʙo ojoti Xud ʙar Fir'avn va raisoni qavmas firistodem va guft: «Man firistodai Parvardigori cahonijonam!»
Cun ojoti Moro ʙar onon arza dost, ʙa nogoh hama az on ʙa xanda aftodand
Va har mu'cizae, ki ʙa onho nison dodem, az mu'cizai digar azimtar ʙud. On goh hamaro ʙa azoʙ giriftor kardem, ʙosad, ki ʙozgardand
Guftand: «Ej codugar, Parvardigoratro ʙo on nomhoe, ki ʙo tu vahj kardaast, ʙarom mo ʙixon, ki mo hidojatsudagonem»
Cun azoʙro az onho ʙardostem, pajmoni xudro sikastand
Fir'avn dar mijoni mardumas nido dod, ki ej qavmi man, ojo podsohii Misru in cujʙoron, ki az zeri poi man cori hastand, az oni man nestand? Ojo nameʙined
Ojo man ʙehtaram jo in mardi xori zalil, ki durust suxan guftan natavonad
Caro dasthojasro ʙa dastʙandhoi tillo najorostaand? Va caro guruhe az faristagon hamrohas najomadaand
Pas Fir'avn qavmi xudro gumroh soxt, to ʙa u ito'at kardand, ki mardume taʙah kor ʙudand
Cun Moro ʙa xasm ovardand, az onho intiqom giriftem va hamagonro ƣarq soxtem
Ononro dar sumori guzastagon va doston ʙaroi ojandagon kardem
Va cun dostoni pisari Marjam ovarda sud, qavmi tu ʙa sodmoni farjod zadand
va guftan, d: «Ojo xudojoni mo ʙehtarand jo U?» Va in suxanro faqat ʙaroi cidol ʙo tu guftaand, ki mardume xusumat kunandaand
U faqat ʙandae ʙud, ki Mo ne'matas ato kardem va mojai iʙrati ʙani- Isroilas gardonidem
Agar mexostem, ʙa coi sumo faristagone padid meovardem, to dar rui zamin conisini sumo gardand
Va ʙesuʙha u (Iso) nisonai faro rasidani qijomat ast. Dar in sak makuned va ʙa Man pajravi kuned! In ast rohi rost
Sajton sumoro az roh ʙoznagardonad, zero u dusmani oskori sumost
Va cun Iso ʙo dalelhoi ravsani xud omad, guft: «Barojaton hikmat ovardaam va omadaam, to cizhoero, ki dar on ixtilof mekuned, ʙajon kunam. Pas az Xudo ʙitarsed va ʙa man ito'at kuned
Xudoi jakto Parvardigori manu Parvardigori sumost. Uro ʙiparasted. Rohi rost in ast»
Guruhho ʙo ham ixtilof kardand. Pas voj ʙar sitamkoron az azoʙi dardovari qijomat
Ojo casm ʙa rohi cize cuz qijomatand, ki nogoh va ʙexaʙar ʙar onho ʙijojad
Dar on ruz duston, — ƣajr az parhezgoron, — dusmani jakdigarand
Ej ʙandagoni Man, dar on ruz ʙime ʙar sumo nest va sumo ƣamgin namesaved
On kason, ki ʙa ojoti Mo imon ovardaand va taslimi amri Mo sudaand
sumo va cufthojaton ʙo sodkomi ʙa ʙihist doxil saved
Qadahhoi zarrin va kuzahoro dar mijonason ʙa gardis meovarand. Dar on cost har ci nafs orzu kunad va dida az on lazzat ʙiʙarad. Va dar on co covidona xohed ʙud
In ʙihistest, ki ʙa ivazi korhoe, ki kardaed, ʙa merosas meʙared
Dar on co ʙarojaton mevahoi ʙisjor hast, ki az onho mexured
Gunahkoron dar azoʙi cahannam covidonand
Azoʙason kam namesavad va onho az noumedi xomus ʙosand
Mo ʙa onho zulme nakardaem, onho xud ʙa xudason sitam kardaand
Farjod ʙarovarand, ki ej moliki duzax kos Parvardigori tu moro ʙimironad. Megujad: «Na, sumo dar in co mondani hasted»
Mo sumoro ʙo haq osno kardem, vale ʙestaraton haqro ʙad dided
Ojo onho dar e'tiqodi xud poj fisurdaand? Mo ham poj fisurdaem
Ojo mepindorand, Mo rozu nacvo (suxanoni pinhoniasonro) namesunavem? Ore, rasuloni Mo nazdi onho hastand va menavisand
Bigu: «Agar Xudoi rahmonro farzande meʙud, man az naxustin parastandagon meʙudam
Pok ast Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va Parvardigori ars az on nisʙatho, ki ʙa U medihend
Pas ʙiguzorason, to ʙa hamon suxanoni ʙotil masƣul ʙosand va ʙa ʙozica sargarm, to on ruze, ki onhoro va'da dodaand, ʙirasad
Ust, ki ham dar osmon Xudost va ham dar zamin Xudost va hakimu donost
Bartaru ʙuzurgvortar ast on kas, ki farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin va har ci dar mijoni onhost, az oni Ust va ilmi faro rasidani qijomat xosi Ust va ʙa U ʙozgardonida mesaved
Kasone ƣajri Uro, ki ʙa xudoi mexonand, qodir ʙa safo'ati kase nestand. Ƣajri kasone, ki az rui ilm ʙa haq sohidi doda ʙosand
Agar az onho ʙipursi, ki ci kase onhoro ofaridaast, megujand: «Olloh». Pas caro az haq ruj megardonand
Guftori pajjomʙar in ʙud: «Ej Parvardigori man, inho mardume hastand, ki imon nameovarand
Pas, az onho darguzar va ʙigu: «Salomat ʙosed!» Ore, ʙa zudi xohand donist
Ho, mim
Savgand ʙa in kitoʙi ravsangar
Mo onro dar saʙi muʙorake nozil kardem. Mo ʙimdihanda ʙudaem
Dar on saʙ har farmone muvofiqi hikmat sodir mesavad
farmone az coniʙi Mo. Va firistandai on ʙudaem
Rahmatest az coniʙi Parvardigorat va alʙatta Ust sunavovu dono
Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va on ci mijoni in du ast, agar sumo jaqinkunandaed
Nest Xudoe ƣajri U. Znnda mekunadu memironad. Parvardigori sumovu Parvardigori padaroni pesini sumost
Na, onho hamcunon ʙa sakki xud dilxusand
Pas muntaziri ruze ʙos, ki osmon ʙa oskoro dud ʙijovarad
Va on dud hamai mardumro dar xud furu girad. Va in azoʙest dardovar
«Ej Parvardigori mo, in azoʙro az mo dur gardon, ki mo imon ovardaem»
Kuco pand megirand? Hol on ki cun pajomʙari ravsangar ʙar onho firistoda sud
az u rujgardon sudand va guftand: «Devonaest ta'limjofta!»
Azoʙro andake ʙarmedorem va sumo ʙoz ʙa dini xud ʙozmegarded
Ruze onhoro ʙa savlate (hamlae) saxt furu girem, ki Mo intiqomgirandaem
Pes az onho qavmi Fir'avnro ozmudem va pajomʙare ʙuzurgvor nazdason omad
«ki ʙandagoni Xudoro ʙa man taslim kuned, ki man pajomʙare aminam
Va niz ʙar Xudo sarkasi makuned, ki man ʙo huccate ravsan nazdi sumo omadaam
Va agar ʙixohed ʙar man sang ʙizaned, man ʙa Parvardigori xud va Parvardigori sumo panoh meʙaram
va agar ʙa man imon nameovarad, az man kanor gired»
Pas Parvardigorasro duo kard, ki inho mardume mucrimand (gunahgorand)
Bandagoni Maro saʙhangom ravona kun, to az pai sumo ʙijojand
Darjoro orom pusti sar guzor, ki on laskar ƣarqsudagonand
Ba'd az xud ci ʙoƣhovu casmasorho ʙar coj guzostand
va kistzorhovu xonahoi neku
va ne'mate, ki dar on ƣarqi sodmoni ʙudand
Hamcunin sud va Mo on ne'mathoro ʙa mardume digar meros guzostem
Na osmon ʙar onho girist va na zamin va na ʙa onho muhlat doda sud
Va mo ʙani-Isroilro az on azoʙi xorkunanda xalos kardem
az azoʙi Fir'avni sarkasi az had guzaranda
va az rui ilm ʙar ahli cahonason ʙarguzidem
Va ojote ʙa onho ato kardem, ki dar on imtihone oskor ʙud
Alʙatta inho megujand
«Pojoni kor cuz hamin margi naxustin nest va mo digar ʙor zinda namesavem
Va agar rost megued, padaroni moro ʙa cahon ʙozovared»
Ojo inho ʙehtarand jo qavmi Tuʙʙa' va kasone, ki pes az on qavm ʙudand? Hamaro halok kardem, ki mucrimon (gunahgoron) ʙudand
Mo in osmonhovu zamin va on ciro mijoni onhost, ʙa ʙozica najofaridaem
Onhoro ʙa haq ofaridaem, vale ʙestarin namedonand
Va'dagohi hama dar ruzi dovari qijomat ast
Ruze, ki hec duste az dusti xud cizero daf' nakunad va az sui kase jori nasavad
ƣajri kase, ki Xudo ʙar u ʙuʙaxsojad, zero Ust ƣoliʙu mehruʙon
Har oina (Alʙatta) daraxti zukkum
ta'omi gunohkoron ast
Monandi misi gudoxta dar sikamho mecusad
Monandi cusidani oʙi cuson
Bigiredas va ʙa saxti ʙa mijoni cahannamas ʙikased
va ʙar saras oʙi cuson ʙirezed, to sikanca savad
Bicas, ki tu ƣoliʙu ʙuzurrvori
In hamon cizest, ki dar on sak mekarded
Parhezkoron dar coi amne hastand
dar ʙoƣhovu casmasorho
liʙoshoe az sundusu istaʙraq mepusand va ruʙarui ham mesinand
Hamcunin hurul'ajnro (huroni faroxcasm) ʙa hamsarijason darovarem
Dar osoistagi har mevaero, ki ʙixohand, metalaʙand
Dar on co ta'mi margro namecasand, ƣajri hamon margi avvalin. Va onhoro Xudo az azoʙi cahannam nigoh dostaast
In ʙaxsisest az coniʙi Parvardigorat va in piruzii ʙuzurgest
Mo adoi suxani xud ʙar zaʙoni tu oson kardem, ʙosad, ki pand girand
Tu muntazir ʙos, ki onho niz muntazirand
Ho, mim
Nozil sudani in kitoʙ az coniʙi Xudoi ƣoliʙu hakim ast
Alʙatta dar osmonhovu zamin nisonahoi iʙratest ʙaroi mu'minon
Va dar ofarinisi sumo va parokanda sudani cunʙandagon iʙrathost ʙaroi ahli jaqin. (imon)
Omadusudi saʙu ruz va rizqe, ki Xudo az osmon mefiristad va zamini murdaro ʙa on zinda mekunad va niz dar vazisi ʙodho iʙrathost ʙaroi oqilon
Inho ojoti Xudost, ki ʙa rosti ʙar tu tilovat mekunem. Ƣajri Xudovu ojotas ʙa kadom suxan imon meovarand
Voj ʙar har duruƣʙofi gunahkore
Ojoti Xudoro, ki ʙar u xonda mesavad, mesunavad. On goh ʙa gardankasi saxt meistad, cunon ki gui hec nasunidaast. Pas ʙa azoʙe dardovaras ʙasorat (xusxaʙar) deh
Cun cize az ojoti Moro faro girad, ʙa masxaraas megirad, inho sazovori azoʙe xorkunandaand
Pesi rujason cahannam ast. Va mole, ki ʙa dast ovardaand va kasone, ki ƣajri Xudoi jakto ʙa xudoi giriftaand, ʙa holason foida nakunad. Onhorost azoʙe ʙuzurg
In rahnamoiest. Va onon, ki ʙa ojoti Parvardigorason imon nameovarand, ʙarojason azoʙest va saxttarin azoʙhoi dardovar
Xudost, ki darjoro romi sumo kard, to dar on ʙa farmoni U kistiho ravon ʙosand va talaʙi ma'isat kuned, ʙosad, ki sukrguzor ʙosed
Romi sumo soxt on ci dar osmonhost va on ci dar zamin ast. Hama az oni Ust. Dar in ʙaroi fikrkunandagon iʙrathoest
Ba kasone, ki imon ovardaand, ʙigu: «Az xatoi kasone, ki ʙa ruzhoi Xudo ʙovar nadorand, darguzared, to xud on mardumro ʙa cazoi amalhoe, ki murtakiʙ sudaand (kardaand), cazo dihad
Har kas kori soistae kunad, ʙa naf'i xudi ust va har kas murtakiʙi kori ʙade savad, ʙa zijoni ust. Sipas hama ʙa sui Parvardigoraton ʙozgardonda mesaved
Mo ʙa ʙani-Isroil kitoʙ va ilmi dovarivu pajomʙari ato kardem va az cizhoi pokizavu xus ruzijason kardem. Va ʙar cahonijon ʙartarijason (ʙehtariason) dodem

Va onhoro dar ʙorai on amr daloile ravsan dodem. Va dar on az rui hasadu kina ixtilof kardand, on goh, ki donis joftand. Xudo dar ruzi qijomat dar on ci ixtilof (ziddijat) mekardand, dovari xohad kard
Pas turo ʙa rohi din andoxtem. Bo on roh ʙirav va az pai xohisi nodonon marav
Inho turo hec az azoʙi Xudo daf' namekunand va zolimon dustdoroni jakdigarand va Xudo dustdori parhezgoron ast
In Qur'on dalelhoi ravsani mardum va hidojatu rahmatest ʙaroi ahli jaqin
Ojo okon, ki kunandai ʙadiho mesavand, mepindorand, ki dar sumori kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, qarorason medihem? Va ojo zindagivu margason jakson ast? Ci ʙad dovari mekunand
Va Xudo osmonhovu zaminro ʙa haq ʙijofarid, to har kasero ʙaroʙari kore, ki kardaast, cazo dihad va ʙa onho sitam nasavad

Ojo on kasro, ki havasasro cun xudoi xud girift va Xudo az rui ilm gumrohas kard va ʙar gusu dilas muhr nihod va ʙar didagonas parda afkand, didai? Agar Xudo hidojat nakunad, ci kase uro hidojat xohad kard? Caro pand namegired
Va guftand: «Cuz zindagii dunjavii mo hec nest. Memiremu zinda mesavem va moro ƣajri dahr halok nakunad». Ononro ʙa on donise nest va faqat dar pindore hastand
Va cun ojoti ravsani Mo ʙar onho tilovat savad, huccatason in ast, ki megujand: «Agar rost megued, padaroni moro zinda kuned»
Bigu: «Xudost, ki sumoro zinda mekunad, pas memiranad va sipas hamaro dar ruzi qijomat, — ki sake dar on nest, — cam' meovarad. Vale ʙestari mardum namedonand!»
Az oni Xudovand ast farmonravoii osmonu zamin. Va on ruz, ki qijomat ʙarpo savad, ahli ʙotil zijon xohand kard
Har ummatero ʙuʙini, ki ʙa zonu daromadaast va har ummatero ʙaroi giriftani nomai a'molas ʙixonand. Dar cunin ruze dar ʙaroʙari amalhoe, ki kardaed, cazo meʙined
In navistai Most, ki ʙa haq suxan megujad, zero Mo korhoero, ki mekardaed, menavistaem
Ammo kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista mekunand. Parvardigorason doxil dar rahmati Xud mekunad va in zafari oskor ast
Ammo, ej onon, ki imon najovardaed, magar ojoti Mo ʙar sumo xonda namesud va sumo takaʙʙur menamuded va mardume gunohkor ʙuded
Cun gufta mesud, ki va'dai Xudo haq ast va dar qijomat sakke nest, megufted: «Mo namedonem qijomat cist? Faqat andak gumone meʙarem va ʙa jaqin (imoni qavi) narasidaem»
Amalhoi zistason dar ʙaroʙarason oskor sud va on cize, ki masxaraas mekardand gird ʙar girdasonro ʙigirift
Ba onho gufta savad: «Imruz faromusaton mekunem, hamcunon, ki sumo didori cunin ruzatonro faromus karda ʙuded. Cojgohaton dar otas ast va sumoro hec jovare nest
Va, in ʙa cazoi on ast, ki ojoti Xudoro ʙa masxara megirifted va zindagii dunjavi sumoro ʙifireft». Pas imruz az in otas kase ʙerunason naʙarad va kase uzrasonro qaʙul nakunad
Sitois az oni Xudost — Parvardigori osmonhovu Parvardigori zamin va Parvardigori cahonijon
Buzurgvori dar osmonhovu zamin xosi Ust va Ust ƣoliʙu hakim
Ho, mim
Nozil sudani in kitoʙ az coniʙi Xudoi ƣoliʙu hakim ast
Mo osmonhovu zamin va on ciro, ki dar mijoni on dust, ʙa hak, va to muddate mu'ajjan ofaridaem. Va kofiron az on ci onhoro metarsonand, ruj megardonand

Bigu: «Az onhoe, ki ƣajri Olloh ʙa xudoi mexoned, xaʙar dihed. Ba man nison dihed, ki az in zamin ci cizro ofaridaand? Jo dar xilqati (ofaridani) osmonho sirkatdostaand? Agar rost megued, ʙaroi man kitoʙe, ki pes az in Qur'on omada ʙosad jo agar donise az pesinijon mondaast, ʙijovared
Va kist gumrohtar az on, ki ʙa coi Olloh cizero ʙa xudoi mexonad, ki to ruzi qijomat ʙa u cavoʙ namedihad, va ʙuton az du'oi ʙutparaston ʙexaʙarand
Va cun dar qijomat mardumro cam' orand, ʙuton ʙo parastandagoni xud dusman ʙosand va az iʙodatason munkirand
Cun ojoti Mo ʙa ravsani ʙa onon xonda savad, kofiron haqiqatero, ki ʙarojason nozil sudaast, gujand: «Coduii oskor ast»

Jo megujand: «In kitoʙ duruƣest, ki xud ʙoftaast!» Bigu: «Agar man onro cun duruƣe ʙa ham ʙofta ʙosam, sumo nametavoned xasmi Xudoro az man ʙozdored. Xudo az on ta'naho, ki ʙa on mezaned, ogohtar ast. Va sohidii U mijoni manu sumo kofist. Va Ust ʙaxsojandavu mehruʙon!»

Bigu: «Man az mijoni digar pajomʙaron navomada (avvalin) nestam va namedonam, ki ʙar man jo ʙar sumo ci xohad sud. Man ʙa cize ƣajri on ci ʙa man vahj mesavad, pajravi namekunam va man faqat ʙimdihandae oskor hastam»

Bigu: «Ci mekuned, agar Qur'on az coniʙi Xudo ʙosad va sumo ʙa on imon najovared? Jake az ʙani-Isroil ʙa on sohidi dod va imon ovard. Vale sumo gardankasi mekuned. Xudo mardumi sitamkorro hidojat namekunad!»
Kofiron mu'minonro guftand: «Agar dar on xajre meʙud, inho az mo pestar qaʙul namekardand». Va cun ʙa on roh najoftand, xohand guft, ki in duruƣe derina ast
Va pes az on kitoʙi Muso rohnamovu rahmat ʙud. Va in kitoʙest tasdiqkunandai on ʙa zaʙoni araʙi to sitamkoronro ʙime va nekukoronro xusxaʙare ʙosad
Alʙatta onon, ki guftand, ki Parvardigori mo Olloh ast, va sipas pojdori kardand, ʙime ʙar onho nest va anduhgin namesavand
Inho ʙa mukofoti amalhojason ahli ʙihistand va dar on co covidonaand

Odamiro ʙa neki kardan ʙo padaru modari xud suporis kardem. Modaras ʙori uro ʙa dusvori ʙardost va ʙa dusvori ʙar zamin nihod. Va muddati haml to az sir ʙozgiriftanas si moh ast to cun ʙa sinni cavoni rasad va ʙa cihilsolagi darojad, gujad: «Ej Parvardigori man, ʙa man ʙijomuz to sukri ne'mate, ki ʙar man va ʙar padaru modaram ato kardai, ʙa on coj oram. Kore soista ʙikunam, ki Tu az on xusnud savi va farzandoni maro soleh kun. Man ʙa Tu ʙozgastam va az taslimsudagonam»
Inho kasone hastand, ki korhoi nekasonro mepazirem va az gunohason darmeguzarem. Dar zumrai ahli ʙihistand. Har va'dae, ki ʙa onho doda suda, rost ast

Va on ki ʙa padaru modaras guft: «Uf ʙar sumo, ojo ʙa man va'da medihed, ki az guram ʙarxezonand va hol on ki mardume pes az man ʙudaand, ki ʙarnaxostaand? Va on du ʙa dargohi Xudo istiƣosa (dodxohi) mekunand va, gujand: «Voj ʙar tu, imon ʙijovar, ki va'dai Xudo haq ast!» Megujad: «Inho cize cuz hamon afsonai pesinijon nest!»
Dar ʙorai inho hamon suxan, ki dar ʙorai ummathoi pesin az cinnu ins gufta suda ʙud, ʙa haqiqat mepajvandad. Inho zijonkunandagonand
Va har jakro nisʙat ʙa kore, ki kardaast, daracahost, to Xudo cazoi korhojasonro ʙa tamomi ʙidihad va ʙa on on sitam namesavad

Va ruze, ki kofironro ʙar otas arza kunand: dar zindagii dunjavi az cizhoi pokiza va xus ʙahramand suded, imruz ʙa azoʙi xori cazojaton medihand. Va in ʙa on saʙaʙ ast, ki dar zamin ʙe hec haqqe takaʙʙuri mekarded va ʙadkori pes girifta ʙuded

Barodari qavmi Odro ʙa jod ʙijovar, ki cun qavmi xudro dar Ahqof ʙim dod — va pes az u pajomʙarone ʙudand va raftandu pas az u pajomʙarone omadand, — ki ƣajri Xudoi jaktoro naparasted, ki man az azoʙi ruze ʙuzurg ʙar sumo metarsam
Guftand: «Ojo omadai, to moro az xudojonamon rujgardon sozi? Agar rost megui, har ci ʙa mo va'da dodai, ʙijovar»
Guft: «Inro Xudo medonad va man on ciro ʙa on firistoda sudaam, ʙa sumo merasonam. Vale meʙinam, ki mardume nodon hasted»
Cun aʙre didand, ki az coniʙi rudxonahoson meojad, guftand: «In aʙre ʙoronzost». Na in hamon cizest, ki onro ʙa sitoʙ metalaʙided. Bod ast va dar on ʙod azoʙe dardovar
ʙa farmoni Parvardigoras hama cizro halok mekunad. Cunon sudand, ki aknun faqat xonahojasonro ʙini. Va Mo mucrimonro (gunahgoronro) in tavr cazo medihem

Va onho cunon tavonu qudrat doda ʙudem, ki ʙa sumo nadidaem. Barojason gusu casmu dil qaror dodem. Vale gusu casmu dilason ʙa holason hec foida nakard, zero ojoti Xudoro inkor mekardand, to on azoʙe, ki ʙa masxaraas megiriftand, onhoro furu srift
Mo hamai qarijahoero (dehahoero), ki atrofi sumo ʙudaand, halok kardaem va ojotro gunogun ʙajon kardem, sojad, ki ʙozgardand
Pas caro on xudojone, ki ƣajri Olloh ʙaroi nazdiki ʙa xudoi girifta ʙudand, jorijason nakardand, ʙalki az nazarason gum sudand? Ija ast duruƣu ʙoftahojason
Va guruhe az cinro nazdi tu ravona kardem, to Qur'onro ʙisnavand. Cun ʙa hazratas (nazdas) rasidand, guftand: «Gus andozed! Cun ʙa pojon omad, monandi ʙimdihandagone nazdi qavmi xud ʙozgastand
Guftand: «Ej qavmi mo, mo kitoʙe sunidem, ki ʙa'd az Muso nozil suda, kitoʙhoi pesinro tasdiq mekunad va ʙa haq va rohi rost roh menamojad
Ej qavmi mo, in da'vatkunanda ʙa Xudoro qaʙul kuned va ʙa u imon ʙijovared, to Xudo gunohonatonro ʙiʙaxsojad va sumoro az azoʙe dardovar dar amon dorad
Va har kase, ki ʙa in da'vatkunanda cavoʙ nagujad, nametavonad, dar rui zamin az Xudo ʙigurezad va uro ƣajri Xudo hec jovare nest va dar gumrohii oskorest!»
Ojo nameʙinand, ki Xudo jaktost, on ki osmonhovu zaminro ʙijofarid va dar ofaridani onho darnamond. U metavonad murdagonro zinda kunad. Bale, U ʙar har kore tavonost
Ruze, ki kofiron ʙa otas arza savand... Ojo in haqiqat nest? Gujand: «Bale, ʙa Parvardigoramon savgand!» Gujad: «Ba xotiri on ki kofir ʙuded, inak azoʙro ʙicased!»

Pas pojdori kun, hamcunon ki pajomʙaroni ululazm (ʙoazm) pojdori karda ʙudand, Va dar uquʙatason sitoʙ makun. On ruz, ki on va'daero, ki ʙa onho doda suda, ʙingarand, pindorand, ki cuz ʙa qadri so'ate az ruz dar gur namonda ʙudand. In rasonidani pajƣom ast. Ojo cuz nofarmonon ʙa halokat merasand
Xudo amalhoi kasonero, ki kofir sudand va mardumro az rohi Xudo ʙozdostand, ʙotil soxtaast

Xudo gunohi kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand va ʙa on ci ʙar Muhammad nozil suda, — ki on haq ast va az coniʙi Parvardigorason, — imon ovardaand, az onho dur kard va korhojasonro ʙa saloh ovard
Va in ʙa on saʙaʙ ast, ki kofiron ʙa ʙotil pajravi kardand va onon, ki imon ovardand, ʙa haqqe, ki az coniʙi Parvardigorason omada ʙud, pajravi kardaand. Xudo ʙaroi mardum incunin misol meorad

Cun ʙo kofiron ruʙaru suded, gardanasonro ʙizaned. Va cun onhoro saxt furu kufted, asirason kuned va saxt ʙiʙanded. On goh jo ʙa minnat ozod kumed jo ʙa fidja (ʙa ivazi pul). To on goh, ki cang ʙa pojon ojad. Va in ast hukmi Xudo. Va agar Xudo mexost, az onon intiqom megirift, vale xost to sumoro ʙa jakdigar ʙijozmojad. Va onon, ki dar rohi Xudo kusta sudaand, amalhojasonro ʙotil namekunad
Ba zudi, ki hidojatason kunad va korhojasonro ʙa saloh ovarad
Va ʙa ʙihiste, ki ʙarojason vasf kardaast, doxilason sozad
Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, agar Xudoro jori kuned, sumoro jori xohad kard va pojdori xohad ʙaxsid
Halokatu surʙaxti ʙod ʙar kofiron. Xudo amalhojasonro ʙotil kardaast
Zero onon cizero, ki Xudo nozil kardaast, noxus dorand. Xudo niz amalhojasonro noʙud kard
Ojo dar zamin sajr nakardaand, to ʙingarand, ki oqiʙati kasone, ki pes az onho ʙudaand, ci guna ʙudaast? Xudo halokason kard va kofiron niz oqiʙate oncunon xohand dost
In ʙa on saʙaʙ ast, ki Xudo jovari 'kasonest, ki imon ovardaand. Va kofironro hec jovare nest

Xudo kasonero, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista mekunand, ʙa ʙihisthoe, ki nahrho az on porist, doxil xohad kard. Va kofiron az in cahon ʙahramand mesavand va cun corpojon mexurand va cojgohason otas ast
Ci qarijahoe (dehahoe), ki mardumas az mardumi qarijai tu, ki az on ʙerunat kardand, xele purquvvattar ʙudand, ki halokason kardem va hec jorikunandae nadostand
Ojo kase, ki az coniʙi Parvardigoras daleli ravsane dorad, monandi kasonest, ki kirdori ʙadason dar nazarason orosta suda va az pai havohoi xud meravand

Vasfi ʙihiste, ki ʙa parhezgoron va'da doda suda, in ast, ki dar on nahrhoest az oʙhoe taƣjirnopazir va nahrhoe az sire, ki ta'mas digargun namesavad va nahrhoe az saroʙ, ki osomandagon az on lazzat meʙarand va nahrhoe az asali musaffo. Va dar on co har guna meva, ki ʙixohand, hast va niz ʙaxsoisi Parvardigorason.
